Poke Ball Mods.name: Poke Ball Mods
Poke Ball Mods.description: You may craft any of the Poke Ball Modifications on the next page.

Zephyr Shield.name: Zephyr Shield
Zephyr Shield.description: Your Flying-Type Pokemon may activate Zephyr Shield as a Standard Action Interrupt, or as a Shift Action during their turn. If they do, until the end of the user's next turn, all ranged attacks targetting them take a -1 penalty to Accuracy and -10 penalty to damage, they become immune to the effects of Moves with the Powder keyword, and they do not lose Hit Points from Weather effects. Additionally, if Zephyr Shield is used as a Standard Action, that Pokemon may use the Resolution Effect of a Flying-Type Move with the Set- Up keyword on their next turn, skipping the Set-Up phase.

Major Gift - March of the Colossus.name: Major Gift - March of the Colossus
prereqs: Minor Gift - Hands of the Creator

Major Gift - Seed Flare.name: Major Gift - Seed Flare
Major Gift - Seed Flare.description: You learn the Move Seed Flare.

Affliction Techniques.name: Affliction Techniques
Affliction Techniques.description:
If the target successfully cures the target of its linked Status Affliction, the item has additional effects.
>Antidote: The target gains +1 Special Defense Combat Stage.
> Burn Heal The target gains +1 Defense Combat Stage.
>Ice Heal: The target gains +1 Attack or Special Attack Combat Stage
>Paralyze Heal:The target gains +1 Speed Combat Stage.

Calculated Assault.name: Calculated Assault
Calculated Assault.description: In Contests: Treat the Move as if it were one step more aligned with the Contest Type. If the Move would be opposing the Contest Type, it is instead neutral. If it is neutral, it is instead matching. You may activate this effect only once per Contest.

Genjutsu.name: Genjutsu
Genjutsu.description: You form an Illusion around yourself. This Illusion may be used to hide yourself in a shroud of darkness if in darkness, or to make yourself look like a mundane object (such as a crate, potted plant, or similar). The Illusion can even fool Aura, concealing you from Aura Sight for its duration. However, the Illusion requires complete concentration, and is broken if you take any actions at all. Anyone that interacts with the Illusion directly may make an Occult Education or Intuition Check with a DC equal to 10 plus your Stealth Rank; if they succeed, the Illusion is broken.

Strike of the Whip.name: Strike of the Whip
Strike of the Whip.description:
You may apply 1 or more of the following effects to the Pokemon hit by Press:
> Give the target 1 Injury and a Tick of Temporary Hit Points.
> Spend 1 AP and cure the target of Confusion, Infatuation, Rage, and Suppression.
> Use an [Order] you know with targets on the target as a Free Action.

Bigger and Boulder.name: Bigger and Boulder
Bigger and Boulder.description: All targets hit by the triggering Move are pushed a number of meters equal to half your Type-Linked Skill Rank or less, and they become Vulnerable for one full round. Create a Stealth Rock Hazard adjacent to each foe hit this way.

Reckless Advance.name: Reckless Advance
Reckless Advance.description: While this Feature is Bound, increase the damage rolls of the target's damaging melee attacks by +8, and these attacks Trip targets on Accuracy Rolls of 18+. When the target of Reckless Advance hits with a damaging melee attack, they become Vulnerable for one full round.

Nature's Embrace.name: Nature's Embrace
Nature's Embrace.description: You learn 2 Moves chosen from the list below, marked with the Rank of this Feature you are gaining or lower.

Slow or Steady.name: Slow or Steady
Slow or Steady.description: Choose Analytic or Battle Armor. You gain the chosen ability.

Poke Ball Crafter.name: Poke Ball Crafter
Poke Ball Crafter.description: You may craft Dusk, Dive, Heal, Luxury, Net, Nest, Quick, Repeat, or Timer Balls for $700. Requires access to a Poke Ball Tool Box.

Trick Shot.name: Trick Shot
Trick Shot.description: While this Feature is Bound, decrease the Accuracy Roll of the target's damaging ranged attacks by -2. The Critical Hit range of those attacks is increased by +3. This Feature does not affect Moves without an AC value.

Capricious Whirl.name: Capricious Whirl
Capricious Whirl.description: While this Feature is Bound, the target has a +3 bonus to its Evasion but deals 5 less damage with all damaging attacks.

Long Shot.name: Long Shot
Long Shot.description: The target's damaging ranged attacks have their range doubled until the end of their next turn, and deal X additional damage. X is equal to the distance in meters that the attack traveled. Long Shot does not increase the size of area of effect attacks. If attacks altered by Long Shot are Critical Hits, add the value of the Damage Dice Roll an additional time to the total damage.

Sentinel Stance.name: Sentinel Stance
Sentinel Stance.description: Until the end of your next turn, the target may attempt to Intercept attacks for allies as a Shift Action. If they do so, they gain 10 Damage Reduction against the attack. If the target is also under the effect of Brace for Impact, they may gain 5 Damage Reduction from it as if they had used a self-targeting Status Move.

Pinpoint Strike.name: Pinpoint Strike
Pinpoint Strike.description: Increase the Accuracy and Effect Range of the target's damaging attacks by +2. These attacks deal 5 less damage, before applying weakness and resistance.

Archival Training.name: Archival Training
Archival Training.description: Each Rank, you gain an Archive.

Dazzling Dervish.name: Dazzling Dervish
Dazzling Dervish.description: Until the end of their next turn, the target adds their non-stat Evasion to their Movement Capabilities and whenever they attack a foe or Shift through a square occupied by a foe, that foe suffers a -3 penalty to all rolls until the end of their next turn. This effect may only affect a foe once per round.

Stone Stance Mastery.name: Stone Stance Mastery
Stone Stance Mastery.description: Whenever you bind Stone Stance, you may choose two Stances and apply the effects of both.

Major Gift - Fairy Aura.name: Major Gift - Fairy Aura
Major Gift - Fairy Aura.description: You gain the Fairy Aura Ability.

Strike Again!.name: Strike Again!
Strike Again!.description: The target may immediately take an additional Standard Action to use an At-Will attack.

Brace for Impact.name: Brace for Impact
Brace for Impact.description: While this Feature is Bound, once a round, when the target uses a self-targeting Status Move, they may gain 5 Damage Reduction until the end of their next turn. They may also activate this effect as a Standard Action.

Nurse.name: Nurse
Nurse.description:
During this Extended Rest, Pokemon and Trainers in your care gain the benefits listed below. The AP Drain cost from triggering this Feature is applied after the Extended Rest is completed and AP Drain has otherwise been restored.
> They heal 1/8th of their Max Hit Points per half hour of rest instead of 1/16th (does not stack with Bandages).
> If the Extended Rest lasts at least 6 hours, they may remove 1 Injury.

Type Methodology.name: Type Methodology
Type Methodology.description:
Effects depend on whether your Pokemon has the Tolerance or Exploit ability:
> Whenever your Pokemon with Tolerance takes Super-Effective damage from a Tagged foe, your Pokemon may lose 2 Momentum to Resist that attack one step.
> Whenever your Pokemon with Exploit deals Resisted damage to a Tagged foe, your Pokemon may lose 2 Momentum to increase the effectiveness of the attack one step.

Iron Grit.name: Iron Grit
Iron Grit.description: When this Feature becomes Bound, the target gains +1 Defense Combat Stage. While the Feature remains bound, the target's Defense Stat cannot be lowered, and its Defense Combat Stages cannot be lowered.

Stat Embodiment.name: Stat Embodiment
Stat Embodiment.description:
Your Pokemon gains an Ability, based on your Chosen Stat, for the remainder of the Scene. Switching does not end this effect. Stat Embodiment may only grant one Ability to a Pokemon at a time. If it is used a second time on the same target, it replaces the first granted Ability.
> Attack Aces give Sheer Force or Defiant
> Defense Aces give Filter or Battle Armor
> Special Attack Aces give Tinted Lens or Competitive
> Special Defense Aces give Multiscale or Tolerance
> Speed Aces give Speed Boost or Vanguard

Style Entrainment.name: Style Entrainment
Style Entrainment.description:
Your Pokemon gains one of the following Abilities corresponding to your chosen Contest Stat for the rest of the Scene, even if it is switched out. Style Entrainment may only grant one Ability to a Pokemon at a time. If it is used a second time on the same target, it replaces the first granted Ability.
> Beauty gives Gentle Vibe or Serene Grace
> Cool gives Defiant or Sniper
> Cute gives Cute Charm or Cute Tears
> Smart gives Analytic or Anticipation
> Tough gives Sturdy or Intimidate

Proper Care.name: Proper Care
Proper Care.description:
You gain additional bonuses to using Restoratives and Features while in a Field Clinic, Poke Center, Hospital, or other dedicated healing space that lets you access supplies.
> When you trigger First Aid Expertise here, the injury that is Removed does not count towards the total number of Injuries that may be removed each day.
> When you trigger Nurse here, Bandages cure 1 Injury after three hours, in addition the injury healed after 6 hours.
> All Restoratives heal an additional 5 Hit Points. This stacks with the bonus granted by Field Clinic.

Flourish.name: Flourish
Flourish.description:
Your Pokemon's Status-Class Moves that affect foes ignore non-Stat Evasion. They may Critically Hit like damaging Moves on a roll of 20. Upon such a Critical Hit, choose one effect from the list below. This Critical Hit rate may be modified as normal.
> If the Move inflicts a Status Affliction with a Save Check, all affected targets get a -4 penalty to their first Save Check.
> If the Move lowers Combat Stages, then pick a Stat that the Move lowers and lower it by 1 additional Combat Stage.
> Your Pokemon gains a Tick of Temporary Hit Points.

Natural Fighter.name: Natural Fighter

Close Quarters Mastery.name: Close Quarters Mastery
Close Quarters Mastery.description:
While this Feature is Bound, the target's Fighting-Type Moves cause foes to become Marked by the target for 1 full round. If the target is a Fighting- Type Pokemon, they may also Mark the Foe for one full round when hitting with a Grapple, Trip, or Push Maneuver.
Marked Foes provoke an attack of Opportunity from the Pokemon that marked them if they Shift out of an adjacent square into a square that is not adjacent, even if they use a Disengage Maneuver. Targets cannot be Marked by more than one Pokemon at a time.

Gravel Before Me.name: Gravel Before Me
Gravel Before Me.description: Create a Stealth Rock Hazard adjacent to your Pokemon.

Beautiful Ballet.name: Beautiful Ballet
Beautiful Ballet.description: Your Pokemon with at least 3d6 in their Beauty Stat from Poffins may activate Beautiful Ballet as a Standard Action to perform one of the following Moves. They must still follow frequency limits as usual for these Moves.

Noise Complaint.name: Noise Complaint
Noise Complaint.description: You learn the Moves Uproar and Hyper Voice.

Glamour Mastery.name: Glamour Mastery
Glamour Mastery.description: Choose Magic Guard or Magic Bounce. You gain the Chosen Ability.

Corrupt Reality.name: Corrupt Reality
Corrupt Reality.description: You may force the foe to reroll that roll.

Commander's Voice.name: Commander's Voice
Commander's Voice.description:
You may give two different [Orders] as a single Standard Action, or you may give one set of [Orders] as a Swift Action.
If this is used to use Focused Command and another [Order] that has targets, the second Order applies to both Pokemon you are commanding that turn. Commander's Voice doesn't allow you to use Focused Command as a Swift Action.

Major Gift - Shared Mortality.name: Major Gift - Shared Mortality
Major Gift - Shared Mortality.description: Target: An Allied Pokemon or Trainer.

Capsule Science.name: Capsule Science
Capsule Science.description:
You learn the Cap Cannon, Cap Ammo, and Wonder Launcher recipes, and you gain the following additional effects when using those items.
>Bean Caps
>Glue Caps
>Net Caps
> Wonder Launcher

Major Gift - Flash Fire.name: Major Gift - Flash Fire
Major Gift - Flash Fire.description: You gain the Flash Fire Ability.

Power Pirouette.name: Power Pirouette
Power Pirouette.description:
Choose one effect:
> All adjacent targets are Confused.
> You gain +1 Combat Stage to a Stat of your choice not raised by the triggering Move.
> Destroy all Hazards within 5 meters, and remove Leech Seed, Trapped, and Stuck from yourself.

Apparition.name: Apparition
Apparition.description: When wielding Melee Weapons, you may use Occult Education or Intimidate instead of Combat to determine the Damage Base of your Struggle Attacks, to resist Disarm Maneuvers, and to qualify for a Weapon's Moves. Your Weapon Attacks always treat you as having the Reach Capability, and foes may not activate Reaction effects against them that specify being hit by a Melee Attack.

Tough as Nails.name: Tough as Nails
Tough as Nails.description: You learn the Moves Endure and Slack Off.

Action Hero Stunt.name: Action Hero Stunt
Action Hero Stunt.description: Instead of using a Skill for this Check, your Pokemon rolls their Cool Dice from Poffins and adds their number of Cool Dice from Stats as a modifier. For example, a Pokemon with 5d6 Cool from Poffins and 2d6 from Attack rolls 5d6+2. Skill Checks invoked by Intercepting attacks, Combat Maneuvers, Moves, and Abilities don't trigger this Feature.

Learn From Your Mistakes.name: Learn From Your Mistakes
Learn From Your Mistakes.description: Your Pokemon may re-roll the Skill Check with a Bonus equal to its number of Smart Dice from Poffins.

Chitin Shield.name: Chitin Shield
Chitin Shield.description: The effect misses, and your Pokemon becomes immune to that Move for the rest of the Scene. Chitin Shield may be triggered once per Scene per Pokemon.

Psionic Sponge.name: Psionic Sponge
Psionic Sponge.description: Your Psychic-Type Pokemon may activate Psychic Sponge as a Shift Action to add a Psychic Type Move known by an ally within X meters to their Move List until the end of their turn. This does not allow them to have duplicate Moves in their Move List. This Feature may only be used once per Pokemon per Scene, and X is equal to your Type-Linked Skill Rank.

Too Spooky.name: Too Spooky
Too Spooky.description: Choose Pressure or Frighten. You gain the chosen Ability.

Silent Assassin.name: Silent Assassin
Silent Assassin.description: While this Feature is Bound, your Struggle Attacks and Weapon Attacks deal Ghost-Type Damage, and you gain the Dead Silent Capability.

Push it to the Limit.name: Push it to the Limit
Push it to the Limit.description: Immediately gain one Injury before resolving the triggering attack. You gain a Tick of Temporary Hit Points and may cure yourself of a Persistent Status Af- fliction. The triggering attack doubles your damage bo- nus from Lessons in Rage and Pain.

Raging Winds.name: Raging Winds
Raging Winds.description: You may learn two Moves from the list below, marked with the Raging Winds Rank you are gaining or lower.

Major Gift - Elemental Manipulation.name: Major Gift - Elemental Manipulation
Major Gift - Elemental Manipulation.description: You gain a Capability based on which Legendary Bird or Beast granted you this Feature. Articuno grants Freezer, Moltres and Entei grant Firestarter, Zapdos and Raikou grant Zapper, and Suicune grants Fountain.

Rouse the Dragon's Blood.name: Rouse the Dragon's Blood
Rouse the Dragon's Blood.description: For 1 full round, the next Herald of Pride Move you use against the triggering foe cannot miss, cannot be Intercepted, and effects that would cause it to miss cannot be activated against it.

Man of Steel.name: Man of Steel
Man of Steel.description: You learn the Moves Meteor Mash and King's Shield. You may use these Moves as Weapon Attacks when wielding Melee Weapons.

Hydro Jet.name: Hydro Jet
Hydro Jet.description: Hydro Jet's effect depends on if the triggering Move was Melee or Ranged.

Experimental AI.name: Experimental AI
Experimental AI.description: Increase the maximum complexity of all Pokebots you create by 2, and increase the maximum complexity of Pokebots you can control by 2.

Explosive Runes.name: Explosive Runes
Explosive Runes.description: You may use Hidden Power, originating the attack from the location of the targeted Glyph. Use your own Stats and Hidden Power values to calculate damage. Using this Feature causes the Glyph to become visible and glow for a minute afterwards.

Jailbreaker.name: Jailbreaker
Jailbreaker.description: You may craft any Poke Ball Case Recipe for which you qualify.

Go, Fight, Win!.name: Go, Fight, Win!
Go, Fight, Win!.description:
Choose and perform one of the cheers below. You may perform each Cheer only once per Scene.
> Show Your Best!
> Don't Stop Now!

Nimble Steps.name: Nimble Steps
Nimble Steps.description: You may perform the Disengage Maneuver as a Swift Action.

Fashionista.name: Fashionista
Fashionista.description: You may craft any Fashionista Recipe for which you qualify.

Voice Lessons.name: Voice Lessons
Voice Lessons.description: You and your Pokemon's Moves with the Sonic keyword gain the Friendly keyword. Voice Lessons may not affect the Move Perish Song. Additionally, whenever your Pokemon use a Move with the Sonic Keyword in a Contest, they may roll +1d6.

Mettle.name: Mettle
Mettle.description: Resolve Damage as if the triggering attack was resisted one step. The triggering foe then loses 2 Combat Stages in the Attack Stat used by the triggering Attack.

Bag of Tricks.name: Bag of Tricks
Bag of Tricks.description: You gain two Trickster Techniques of your choice, found on the next page.

Fairy Rite.name: Fairy Rite
Fairy Rite.description: Your Fairy-Type Pokemon may activate Fairy Rite as a Standard Action to lose any number of Hit Points, up to a maximum equal to your Pokemon's Level, and heal an adjacent Ally by that many Hit Points. Then, if your Fairy-Type Pokemon has any Fairy Lights, they may immediately expend any Fairy Lights to gain a Tick of Hit Points, or cause an ally within 6 meters to gain a Tick of Hit Points.

Effective Methods.name: Effective Methods
Effective Methods.description: Your Pokemon loses 2 Tutor Points and gains your choice of the Exploit or Tolerance Ability. You may only target a Pokemon once with Effective Methods.

Master of Arms.name: Master of Arms
Master of Arms.description: You learn the Call to Arms and Unlimited Steel Works Talents.

Mt. Moon Blues.name: Mt. Moon Blues
Mt. Moon Blues.description: You learn the Moves Sing and Supersonic

First Blood.name: First Blood
First Blood.description: If you have a Pokemon turn available this round or next, your Pokemon may use a Move as an Interrupt as soon as it is sent out. This consumes your Pokemon turn for the round (or the following round) as normal.

Rider.name: Rider
Rider.description: While you are Mounted on a Pokemon under the effects of Agility Training, the bonuses from Agility Training are doubled.

Major Gift - Relic Song.name: Major Gift - Relic Song
Major Gift - Relic Song.description: You learn the Move Relic Song.

Cutthroat.name: Cutthroat
Cutthroat.description: You may use Rogue Moves as Weapon Moves when wielding Small Melee Weapons or Short Ranged Weapons. If you do, Rogue Moves instead have the same Range as your Weapon. Additionally, you may qualify for Weapon Moves for Small Melee or Short Ranged Weapons and resist Disarm Maneuvers when wielding such Weapons using any Rogue Skill.

Push Buttons.name: Push Buttons
Push Buttons.description: Your Social Moves' Frequency is not Expended if they miss. You gain the Demoralize Edge, even if you do not meet the prerequisites. Its effects for Status Moves now trigger on 18+, and Social Moves that activate this \

Gneiss Aim.name: Gneiss Aim
Gneiss Aim.description: The Move gains the Smite keyword for that use.

Shrug Off.name: Shrug Off
Shrug Off.description: Once per day, each of your Pokemon may spend a Shift Action to remove 1 Injury from themselves; this may also be activated as a Free Action whenever your Pokemon Take a Breather.

Clear Shot.name: Clear Shot
Clear Shot.description: The target is considered Vulnerable against this attack, and you increase your Critical Hit range by +4 for this attack.

I'm a Doctor.name: I'm a Doctor
I'm a Doctor.description: Each Rank, you gain one of Field Clinic or Medic Training and one of Nurse or First Aid Expertise.

Capture Specialist.name: Capture Specialist
Capture Specialist.description: You gain two Capture Techniques of your choice, found on the next page. You must meet any prerequisites of the Technique.

Mystic Defense.name: Mystic Defense
Mystic Defense.description: You learn the Moves Light Screen and Safeguard.

Pact Gift.name: Pact Gift
Pact Gift.description: You gain your Patron's Pact Gift. Lower Pantheon Legendaries do not have Pact Gifts.
prereqs: All of your Patron's Major Gifts

Psychic Resonance.name: Psychic Resonance
Psychic Resonance.description: Your Pokemon may use the Move Encore against the triggering foe, as if it was on their Move List.

Sign Mastery.name: Sign Mastery
Sign Mastery.description: You acquire two Blessings in the form of Signs, marked with the Sign Mastery Rank you are gaining or lower. You must additionally meet any Prerequisites of the Blessing.

Lifelong Learning.name: Lifelong Learning
Lifelong Learning.description: Your Pokemon may have up to 4 Moves from their Move List come from TMs or Move Tutors.
prereqs: one Mentor Skill at Master Rank

Crystal Resonance.name: Crystal Resonance
Crystal Resonance.description: You roll an additional 3d6 when determining how many Shards you find when Dowsing.

Experimental Designs.name: Experimental Designs
Experimental Designs.description:
Choose an Augmentation the target has and apply the upgrade below. Experimental Designs may affect a target twice.
>Enhanced Sight
>Smart Vision
>Synthetic Muscle
>Embedded Weaponry
>Wired Reflexes
>Medical Nanobots
>Dermal Plating
>Thermal-Optic Camo

Warped Transmission.name: Warped Transmission
Warped Transmission.description: All adjacent foes to the square you end in after teleporting or using Ally Switch have their Evasion lowered by 3 for one full round and cannot trigger Attacks of Opportunity against you for Shifting until the end of your next turn.

Look and Learn.name: Look and Learn
Look and Learn.description: When you activate Look and Learn, you may gain any of the Features below even though they are Features from other Classes. You do not need to meet their normal prerequisites, but you must meet their Prerequisites listed here. Look and Learn can be used two times; once to learn a Feature from the \

Polished Shine.name: Polished Shine
Polished Shine.description: The Effect Range of your Pokemon's Steel-Type Moves is increased by +2.

Power Chord.name: Power Chord
Power Chord.description: Make a Charm or Focus Check, and add your Special Attack. Foes in the area of effect take Special Normal-Type Damage equal to the result.

Small Prophecies.name: Small Prophecies
Small Prophecies.description: Roll 1d20 and note the result. Until the end of your next turn, you may choose to replace a single d20 roll you or a willing ally makes with the noted result.

Major Gift - Pure Breathing.name: Major Gift - Pure Breathing
Major Gift - Pure Breathing.description: You are immune to the Moves Rage Powder, Poison Gas, Poisonpowder, Sleep Powder, Smog, Smokescreen, Spore, Stun Spore, and Sweet Scent.

Emergency Release.name: Emergency Release
Emergency Release.description: The next Pokemon you send out is treated as if the recalled Pokemon had used Baton Pass on it.

Firebrand.name: Firebrand
Firebrand.description: Your Fire-Type Moves Burn Targets on a roll of 19+. If a move already has a chance of Burning foes, Firebrand increases the effect range by +2.

Broodlord.name: Broodlord
Broodlord.description: You gain the following Ability based on your Embrace:

Glitch Burst.name: Glitch Burst
Glitch Burst.description:
Glitch Burst's effect depends on the triggering Move.
>Disable
>Snatch
>Metronome
>Topsy-Turvy

Scoundrel's Strike.name: Scoundrel's Strike
Scoundrel's Strike.description:
The target loses Hit Points equal to your highest Rogue Skill Rank doubled, and an additional effect based on whether you have the Ambush or Cruelty Ability. You may use Scoundrel's Strike only once per Scene per target.
> Ambush
> Cruelty

Style Flourish.name: Style Flourish
Style Flourish.description: In Contests: Re-Roll all dice that result in 1s. This effect may only be used once per Contest.

Accessorize.name: Accessorize
Accessorize.description: You may wear and benefit from two Accessory Slot Items at once. The two items must be of different types and must not share an effect. For example, a Fire Brace cannot be paired with another Fire Brace or a Fire Plate, but it could be paired with an Ice Brace, a Fire Booster, or a Stat Booster.

Cheerleader.name: Cheerleader
Cheerleader.description: Your Pokemon loses 2 Tutor Points and gains the Friend Guard Ability.

Mobilize.name: Mobilize
Mobilize.description: The target cannot provoke Attacks of Opportunity on their next turn. Mobilize may target an Ally only once per encounter.

Genetic Memory.name: Genetic Memory
Genetic Memory.description: The target loses 2 Tutor Points and learns any Move from its Egg Move or Tutor Move List. Genetic Memory may target a Pokemon only twice: once with a Tutor Move and once with an Egg Move. Egg Moves tutored this way do not count against the limit of 3 for TM and Tutor Moves.

Fan The Flames.name: Fan The Flames
Fan The Flames.description: Instead of its usual range, the attack may be performed as if it had a range of Burst 1 if melee, or Cone 2 if ranged.

Pact Gift - Lunar Dance.name: Pact Gift - Lunar Dance
Pact Gift - Lunar Dance.description: You learn the Move Lunar Dance.

Major Gift - Mist Ball.name: Major Gift - Mist Ball
Major Gift - Mist Ball.description: You learn the Move Mist Ball.

Kinjutsu.name: Kinjutsu
Kinjutsu.description: You learn the Moves Substitute and Toxic.

Pusher.name: Pusher
Pusher.description: Your Pokemon gain the Basic Ranged Attacks, Aura Pulse, Enticing Bait, Extended Invisibility, Far Reading, Precise Threadings, Seismometer, TK Mastery, and Trail Sniffer Poke Edges automatically if they qualify for them, without having to invest any Tutor Points.

Fighter's Versatility.name: Fighter's Versatility
Fighter's Versatility.description: You may give up use of a Scene or Daily Move to regain use of a Scene or Daily Move which you have already used. You may give up use of a Daily Move to regain use of a Scene Move, but not vice-versa.
prereqs: Learned two Scene or Daily Moves

Steelheart.name: Steelheart
Steelheart.description: When wielding metal Melee Weapons, you may use Athletics or Focus instead of Combat to determine the Damage Base of your Struggle Attacks, to qualify for a Weapon's Moves, and to resist Disarm Checks. Whenever your Weapon Attacks hit a foe who has previously hit you with a Melee attack in the same round, the foe loses a Tick of Hit Points.

Major Gift - Bad Dreams.name: Major Gift - Bad Dreams
Major Gift - Bad Dreams.description: You gain the Bad Dreams Ability.

Metamagic.name: Metamagic
Metamagic.description: You may apply a Rank 1 Power Manipulation to your attack.

Martial Artist.name: Martial Artist
Martial Artist.description: Choose one of the abilities listed below. You gain the chosen Ability, and its associated tags. Whenever you gain any Martial Artist Feature, you also gain the associated tags.

Burst of Speed.name: Burst of Speed
Burst of Speed.description: Select an Initiative Count equal to half of your own Initiative or less; you may take an extra turn at that point in the round.

Boo!.name: Boo!
Boo!.description: The next Ghost-Type attack the target makes that turn gains the Smite keyword and can't be Intercepted or avoided in any way (Dodge, Parry, Shield Moves, etc).

Style is Eternal.name: Style is Eternal
Style is Eternal.description: Your Pokemon instead retains their Held Item. Style is Eternal may only be used once per Scene per Pokemon.

Desperate Strike.name: Desperate Strike
Desperate Strike.description: Your Pokemon may apply the effects of Cruelty to the attack without expending Cruelty's Frequency. Cruelty's effects may be purchased as if the foe had additional injuries equal to the number of injuries on the user. Desperate Strike may be used once per Scene per Pokemon.

Ancient Heritage.name: Ancient Heritage
Ancient Heritage.description: The target loses 2 Tutor Points and learns Ancient Power. If the target has Ancient Power in its Level-Up List, Ancient Heritage costs no Tutor Points. As a static effect, whenever your Pokemon use Ancient Power, its activated effect occurs on 18+ and you may always choose whether it deals Physical or Special Damage, using the appropriate attack Stat.

Recoup Energy.name: Recoup Energy
Recoup Energy.description: You do not expend the Frequency of the trig- gering Move. If you applied a Power Manipulation to the triggering Move, you are refunded the AP for the Manipulation or do not expend the Frequency for it.

Haunted Wounds.name: Haunted Wounds
Haunted Wounds.description: After one full round, repeat the triggering attack against one target as a Free Action, regardless of range. If this attack hits, it deals damage as if it were resisted one step further. Haunted Wounds may only affect a target once per Scene.

Grand Hex.name: Grand Hex
Grand Hex.description: Regain one use of a Move gained from Hex Maniac Studies that can inflict a Status Affliction that the triggering target has. If you activated the conditional damage boost for Hex, its Frequency is not expended. You may only activate Grand Hex once per target per Scene.

Elite Trainer.name: Elite Trainer
Elite Trainer.description: Choose Agility Training, Brutal Training, Focused Training, or Inspired Training. You gain the chosen Feature, even if you do not meet the prerequisites. When training, you may apply up to two different [Training] Features on each of your Pokemon. If you already have all of these Features, instead pick another Feature for which you qualify.

This Will Not Stand.name: This Will Not Stand
This Will Not Stand.description: Your Pokemon gains +1 Combat Stage in each of Attack, Special Attack, and Speed. This Will Not Stand may trigger only once per Scene per Pokemon.

Shocking Speed.name: Shocking Speed
Shocking Speed.description: You may activate this Feature to have your Electric-Type Pokemon may use an Electric-Type Move with a Frequency of At-Will as if it had Priority (Advanced).

Tough Tumble.name: Tough Tumble
Tough Tumble.description: Your Pokemon with at least 3d6 in their Tough Stat from Poffins may activate Tough Tumble as a Standard Action to perform one of the following Moves. They must still follow frequency limits as usual for these Moves.

Haunting Curse.name: Haunting Curse
Haunting Curse.description:
While this Feature is bound, the target gains a Curse Token each time they use a Ghost-Type Move or Ghost Step. Ghost-Type Moves with a Set-Up and Resolution Phase give a Curse Token for each Phase. As a Standard Action during their turn, or as Free Action upon Fainting, the target may spend their Curse Tokens to apply conditions to a foe within 6 meters.
> 1 Curse Token
> 2 Curse Tokens
> 3 Curse Tokens
> 4 Curse Tokens

Fey Trance.name: Fey Trance
Fey Trance.description: While this Feature is bound, whenever the target uses a 1-Target Move with the Social Keyword or a Fairy-Type Status Move, the foe hit by the triggering Move becomes Infatuated with your Pokemon, and immediately Shifts towards your Pokemon, forfeiting their next Shift Action. This may affect a specific foe only once per Scene.

Chronicler.name: Chronicler
Chronicler.description:
You make Record of the target. Records can be placed in an Archive as an Extended Action. When you take Chronicler, you gain one Archive.
For more details, see```Chronicler Archive List```

PK Alpha.name: PK Alpha
PK Alpha.description: You learn the Moves Kinesis and Barrier.

Null Error.name: Null Error
Null Error.description: You learn the Moves Disable and Snatch.

Maelstrom.name: Maelstrom
Maelstrom.description: You gain the Gilled Capability, and a +2 bonus to your Swim speed. Whenever your Water-Type Moves miss all targets, you gain a Tick of Temporary Hit Points.

Major Gift - Life Force.name: Major Gift - Life Force
Major Gift - Life Force.description: You gain the Life Force Ability.
prereqs: Two Major Gifts from the Tower Duo

Quick Wit.name: Quick Wit
Quick Wit.description: You may make a Manipulate Maneuver or use a Social Move you know, Frequency allowing.
prereqs: a Provocateur Skill at Adept Rank

Giftsapper.name: Giftsapper
Giftsapper.description: As long as Giftsapper's user is conscious, all Trainers within 10 meters must make a Focus Check with DC equal to three times the highest Skill Rank of Giftsaper's user between Focus, Intimidate, or Command in order to activate their Gifts. This Check is made each time a Trainer attempts to use an activated Gift, and a failure means neither any resources such as AP nor the frequency of the Gift is expended. For Gifts with Static or ongoing effects, the Check is made each turn, and a failure ends the effect for that turn. Giftsapper's user may never gain Gifts.

Magnetize.name: Magnetize
Magnetize.description: You gain the Magnetic Capability and may use this magnetism to stick to surfaces with significant met- al content (ex: metal walls obviously, concrete with met- al I-beams inside, etc). You may use your Overland to traverse any such surfaces, even if that means walking vertically up a wall or upside down on a ceiling. You may choose not to be Pushed when on such a surface.

Tectonic Shift.name: Tectonic Shift
Tectonic Shift.description: Pick two of Earthquake, Earth Power, or Sand Tomb. You learn the chosen Moves.

Choreographer.name: Choreographer
Choreographer.description: The target loses 2 Tutor Point and learns a Dance Move created by yourself. Choreographer may target a Pokemon multiple times.

Ghost Step.name: Ghost Step
Ghost Step.description: Your Ghost-Type Pokemon may activate this Feature by spending a Shift Action to remove themselves from the field. They may not be targeted in any way during this time. At the beginning of their next turn, they reappear in any square of their choice that they could have Shifted to from their previous location. Each Pokemon may activate Ghost Step only once per Scene.

Dumplings.name: Dumplings
Dumplings.description: Ingredient 1: Leftovers, Preserves, or a Snack made with Chef

Sage.name: Sage
Sage.description: The target gains Damage Reduction equal to your Occult Education Rank doubled or their Tick Value, whichever is higher, for one full round. Multiple uses of Sage from different Trainers do not stack on one target.

Telepath (Feature).name: Telepath (Feature)
Telepath (Feature).description: You gain the Telepathy Capability for the rest of the scene.

Resilience.name: Resilience
Resilience.description: Your Pokemon does not gain a Status Affliction, and the triggering attack does damage as if it was not a Critical Hit. Resilience may only be used once per target per Scene.

Medic.name: Medic
Medic.description: You are always considered to have access to a First Aid Manual and a Combat Medic's Primer, and are always considered to be Binding their Rank 1 Effects without actually using any AP.

Earthroil.name: Earthroil
Earthroil.description: Your Ground-Type Pokemon may activate Earthroil as a Shift Action to use a damaging Ground- Type Move as it had a range of Line 4 or Burst 1 instead of its usual range, and as if it had the Groundsource keyword. 1-Target Moves performed this way take a -5 penalty to their Damage Rolls.

Enchanting Transformation.name: Enchanting Transformation
Enchanting Transformation.description:
You perform a magical transformation on yourself. While this Feature is Bound, you gain +5 Damage Resistance against Dragon, Fighting, Dark, and Bug-Typed attacks and your Glamour Weaver Moves have the additional effects below.
> Sweet Kiss
> Dazzling Gleam
> Draining Kiss
> Moonblast
> Aromatic Mist

Patch Cure.name: Patch Cure
Patch Cure.description: You distill the target, gaining 3 Restorative Patches. Restorative Patches have the same effect as the items from which they were created, but can only be applied as an Extended Action.

Blur (Feature).name: Blur (Feature)
Blur (Feature).description: Attacks and Moves targeting you that don't require an Accuracy Check now require one, as though they had Accuracy Check of 2. You may only apply half of your Evasion to these Attacks and Moves.

Assault Armor.name: Assault Armor
Assault Armor.description: Your Pokemon gains Damage Reduction against the attack equal to your Type-Linked Skill Rank. Additionally, calculate Type Effectiveness with this attack as if your Pokemon has no Typings besides Steel.

Battle Synchronization.name: Battle Synchronization
Battle Synchronization.description: For one full round, whenever a Channeled Pokemon successfully hits a foe, all Channeled Pokemon > gain +1 Accuracy and +1 Evasion against that foe for the duration of this Feature.

Overgrowth.name: Overgrowth
Overgrowth.description: One target of the triggering Move is afflicted with Overgrowth. As long as the target is afflicted, they are one step less Resistant to Grass-Type attacks, to a maximum of neutral damage, and they cannot recover Hit Points or gain Temporary Hit Points. Whenever they would do so, you gain those Hit Points or Temporary Hit Points instead. Overgrowth is removed when the target Takes a Breather or is hit by a damaging Fire, Ice, Poison, Flying, or Bug-Type attack. Overgrowth may only affect a target once per Scene.

How To Shoot Web.name: How To Shoot Web
How To Shoot Web.description: You gain the Threaded and Wallclimber Capabilities.

Command Versatility.name: Command Versatility
Command Versatility.description: Your Pokemon may give up use of a Scene or Daily Move to regain use of a Scene or Daily Move which it has already used. Your Pokemon may give up use of a Daily Move to regain use of a Scene Move, but not vice-versa. You may use Command Versatility only once per Scene per Pokemon.

Earthen Bond.name: Earthen Bond
Earthen Bond.description: You gain the Tremorsense Capability, and you gain Naturewalk for Cave, Mountain and Desert.

Malediction.name: Malediction
Malediction.description: Use a Status-Class Move gained from Hex Maniac Studies targeting the triggering foe as a Free Action, Frequency-permitting.

Chemical Warfare.name: Chemical Warfare
Chemical Warfare.description: The Pester Ball creates a Blast 2, affecting all targets in the area.

Major Gift - Lava-blooded.name: Major Gift - Lava-blooded
Major Gift - Lava-blooded.description: Static Effect: You are immune to the ambient heat of volcanic areas. Unless you come into direct contact with molten rock, you will not be harmed. You resist Fire Type Moves by one step.

Major Gift - Magic Bounce.name: Major Gift - Magic Bounce
Major Gift - Magic Bounce.description: You gain the Magic Bounce Ability.

Emergency Reactivation.name: Emergency Reactivation
Emergency Reactivation.description: The triggering user does not suffer Augmenta- tion Shock and their Augmentations are not disabled. This Feature may affect a target only once per Scene.

Major Gift - Sun Blanket.name: Major Gift - Sun Blanket
Major Gift - Sun Blanket.description: You gain the Sun Blanket Ability.

Major Gift - Shatter Memory.name: Major Gift - Shatter Memory
Major Gift - Shatter Memory.description: Target: Pokemon or Trainer within 8 meters

Martial Achievement.name: Martial Achievement
Martial Achievement.description: You gain a Martial Achievement based on your Chosen Ability.

World of Darkness.name: World of Darkness
World of Darkness.description: You create a zone of Shifting Darkness in a Burst 2 around you, which persists until the end of the en- counter. All targets without Darkvision attacking from or i nto the Shifting Darkness receive a -3 penalty to Ac- curacy. You may count Shifting Darkness as complete darkness for the purposes of activating your Living Shadow. As a Static effect, you also gain the Darkvision Capability.

Highlander.name: Highlander
Highlander.description: While this Feature is Bound, the target gains X Damage Reduction against Dragon-Type attacks, and gain a +X Bonus to Damage Rolls with Dragon-Typed attacks against other Dragon-Typed targets. X is equal to your Type-Linked Skill Rank.

Archive Tutor.name: Archive Tutor
Archive Tutor.description: Select a Record in your Technique Archive that is of a Move that the target can learn by Level Up, TM or by Move Tutor. The target learns the Move and loses 2 Tutor Points. You can target someone else's Pokemon only once with Archive Tutor; you may target your own Pokemon any number of times with Archive Tutor, but they must still abide by any Move Pool Limitations (ie: no more than 3 of the user's Move Pool can come from TMs or Tutor Moves).

Apothecary.name: Apothecary
Apothecary.description: You gain use of any Apothecary Recipe for which you qualify.

Fortress.name: Fortress
Fortress.description: You Mark all targets of the attack until the end of your next turn. Marked foes take a penalty to Attack Rolls against any targets besides you equal to your Focus Rank. A Mark from a different source (such as a second Fortress or a Fighting Type Ace's Pokemon) will overwrite your Mark.

Passionato Harmony.name: Passionato Harmony
Passionato Harmony.description: You learn the Moves Dazzling Gleam and Draining Kiss.

Fight On and On.name: Fight On and On
Fight On and On.description: You are not Fainted; you instead Faint upon reaching -50% of your Max Hit Points. If you have 5 or more injuries, you may use this Feature regardless of Frequency.

Pact Gift - Ghost in the Machine.name: Pact Gift - Ghost in the Machine
Pact Gift - Ghost in the Machine.description: You gain the Wired capability. Electronics you are occupying gradually degrade and begin to malfunction over time.

Breadth of Knowledge.name: Breadth of Knowledge
Breadth of Knowledge.description: You gain three Skill Edges for which you qualify. These Edges must be used to gain a Skill Edge with an Education Skill, or to gain an Edge that has an Education Skill as a Prerequisite that you meet.

Power of Rage.name: Power of Rage
Power of Rage.description: Choose Enduring Rage, or White Flame. You gain the chosen Ability.

Arcane Favor.name: Arcane Favor
Arcane Favor.description: Your Pokemon and all allies on the Field gain a +1 Bonus to all rolls for one full round.

Ravager Orders.name: Ravager Orders
Ravager Orders.description: You gain the Reckless Advance and Strike Again! Orders.

Pact Gift - Water Spout.name: Pact Gift - Water Spout
Pact Gift - Water Spout.description: You learn the Move Water Spout.

Mold the Earth.name: Mold the Earth
Mold the Earth.description: Your Pokemon may use the Groundshaper Capability as a Free Action. When used this way, Groundshaper creates Spike Hazards in each square turned into Rough or Slow Terrain. If you wish, instead of Groundshaper's normal range, you may choose to affect the square targeted by the attack and all cardinally adjacent squares. If the triggering Move is a Burst, Blast, Line, or Cone, you may choose to affect all squares in the targeted area instead.

PK Omega.name: PK Omega
PK Omega.description: You learn the Moves Telekinesis and Psychic.

Reactive Armour.name: Reactive Armour
Reactive Armour.description: All foes within a Burst 1 lose Hit Points equal to double your Athletics or Focus Rank, and you gain Damage Reduction equal to double your Athletics or Focus Rank for one full round.

Crash and Smash.name: Crash and Smash
Crash and Smash.description: You learn the Moves Double Edge and Thrash. You may use these moves as a Weapon Attack when wielding Melee Weapons.

Corrosive Blight.name: Corrosive Blight
Corrosive Blight.description: The target gains the Blight Condition for one full round. Blighted targets lose a Tick of Hit Points upon being hit by any attack. If the attack is Poison-Typed, the Blight effect's duration is refreshed.

Accentuated Taste.name: Accentuated Taste
Accentuated Taste.description:
Whenever you create a Snack with a Chef Feature, you may assign it a Taste chosen from Salty, Sour, Spicy, Dry, and Sweet. Tasty Snacks must be assigned their corresponding Taste. Whenever a Pokemon trades in a Digestion Buff from a Snack with an assigned Taste they do not dislike, they gain the following bonuses:
> Salty
> Spicy
> Sour
> Dry
> Bitter

Vile Body.name: Vile Body
Vile Body.description: Choose Absorb Force, Poison Point, or Poison Touch. You gain the chosen Ability.

Pact Gift - Blue Flare.name: Pact Gift - Blue Flare
Pact Gift - Blue Flare.description: You learn the Move Blue Flare.
prereqs: All Reshiram and Shared Tao Trio Major Gifts

Pack Master.name: Pack Master
Pack Master.description: For you and your Pokemon with Teamwork, Teamwork's effect now reads \

Coordinator.name: Coordinator
Coordinator.description: Your Pokemon may reroll a single Appeal Roll or Damage Roll. This Feature may be used only once per Contest, and once per Pokemon per Scene.

Guidance.name: Guidance
Guidance.description: Your Pokemon's base Move List Limit is increased by +1 (Reminder: The default Move List Limit is 6).

Type Refresh.name: Type Refresh
Type Refresh.description: The target regains one use of a Scene-Frequency Move of your Chosen Type, and refreshes the Frequency of all EOT-Frequency Moves of your Chosen Type. A Target can be affected by Type Refresh only once per Scene.

Conqueror's March.name: Conqueror's March
Conqueror's March.description: This round, if being used as a Mount, the target may use Dash, Burst, Blast, Cone, or Line range Moves with a range of Pass instead of their usual range.

Gale Speed.name: Gale Speed
Gale Speed.description: Choose Celebrate or Gale Wings. You gain the chosen Ability.

Shade Caller.name: Shade Caller
Shade Caller.description: You learn the Moves Faint Attack and Snarl.

Shield Bearer.name: Shield Bearer
Shield Bearer.description: You may immediately ready a Shield, and do not become Slowed as a result. You may choose to grant an adjacent Ally the Evasion and Damage Reduction bonuses from your shield instead of gaining them yourself, but these bonuses only apply as long as the ally remains adjacent to you. If you do and the ally Shifts, you may Shift alongside your ally as a Shift Action Interrupt. This cannot cause you to shift more than your normal Movement.

Miasma Unleashed.name: Miasma Unleashed
Miasma Unleashed.description: You learn the moves Sludge Wave and Toxic.

Major Gift - Mind Lock.name: Major Gift - Mind Lock
Major Gift - Mind Lock.description: You gain the Mind Lock Capability.

Let's Be Friends!.name: Let's Be Friends!
Let's Be Friends!.description: The target may attempt to improve the disposition of a Wild Pokemon as if making a Charm Check. They roll their Cute Dice from Poffins and add their number of Cute Dice from Stats as a modifier. For example, a Pokemon with 4d6 Cute from Poffins and 3d6 Cute from Speed rolls 4d6+3 in place of a Charm Check

Divination.name: Divination
Divination.description: You may perform an Augury or Scrying.

Face Me Whelp.name: Face Me Whelp
Face Me Whelp.description: While your Pokemon is adjacent to a foe they Marked, that foe gains a -X penalty to Accuracy Rolls and a -10 penalty to Damage Rolls on attacks that do not target the Pokemon that Marked them. X is equal to half your Type-Linked Skill Rank.

Green Path.name: Green Path
Green Path.description: You gain the Naturewalk (Grassland) and Naturewalk (Forest) capabilities, and you are immune to Moves with the Powder keyword.

Major Gift - Aura Break.name: Major Gift - Aura Break
Major Gift - Aura Break.description: You gain the Aura Break Ability.

Endurance.name: Endurance
Endurance.description: Your Pokemon can ignore up to X meters of falling when calculating falling damage, act without beginning to suffocate for X additional rounds, or ignore the Hit Point loss effects from acting while Heavily Injured for X rounds. X is equal to half its number of Tough Dice from Poffins.

Cavalier's Reprisal.name: Cavalier's Reprisal
Cavalier's Reprisal.description: You may make a Struggle Attack against the triggering foe.

Vim and Vigor.name: Vim and Vigor
Vim and Vigor.description: The target loses 2 Tutor Points, and gains the Vigor Ability.

Second Strike.name: Second Strike
Second Strike.description: You may immediately use Rock Smash or a Struggle Attack against your target as a Free Action.

Immutable Mind.name: Immutable Mind
Immutable Mind.description: If the triggering Move was a Status-Class Move, the Move fails. If the Triggering Move was a Damaging Move with a Secondary Effect that triggers on a certain roll, you are immune to the secondary effect.

Unexpected Attacks.name: Unexpected Attacks
Unexpected Attacks.description: You learn the Moves Pursuit and Sucker Punch.
prereqs: two Rogue Skills at Adept Rank

Finisher.name: Finisher
Finisher.description: You and your Pokemon gain a +5 bonus to Damage Rolls against Fainted, Flinched, Sleeping, Stuck, Slowed, Trapped, or Tripped targets.

Tumbler.name: Tumbler
Tumbler.description: You gain the Run Away Ability.

Flexible Form.name: Flexible Form
Flexible Form.description: Your body becomes more malleable, and even your bones are able to flex when required. You do not gain Injuries from taking Massive damage, and you gain a +2 Bonus to any Acrobatics or Athletics Check made to bend, squeeze, or otherwise contort your body -in- cluding those to avoid Trip or Grapple maneuvers.

Skirmisher.name: Skirmisher
Skirmisher.description: Choose Flutter or Vanguard. You gain the Chosen Ability.

Call the Dragon's Rage.name: Call the Dragon's Rage
Call the Dragon's Rage.description: Your learn the Moves Dragon Claw and Dragon Tail. You may use these Moves as Weapon Attacks when wielding Melee Weapons.

Symbolsight.name: Symbolsight
Symbolsight.description: For the next ten minutes, you see the world through the lens of Symbolsight. You may end this effect early as a Free Action.

Lessons.name: Lessons
Lessons.description: You may perform any Mentor Lesson for which you qualify.

Underhanded Tactics.name: Underhanded Tactics
Underhanded Tactics.description: You gain your choice of Ambush or Cruelty.
prereqs: a Rogue Skill at Expert Rank

Brutal Training.name: Brutal Training
Brutal Training.description: The target becomes Brutal until the end of the effect duration. Brutal Pokemon increase the Critical- Hit and Effect Range of all attacks by +1.

Prismatic Alignment.name: Prismatic Alignment
Prismatic Alignment.description:
The effect of this Feature depends on the Triggering Move. You may only use Prismatic Alignment with each Move once per Scene.
>Flash
>Swift
>Tri Attack
>Weather Ball
>Hyper Beam
>Morning Sun

Dead-Eye Shot.name: Dead-Eye Shot
Dead-Eye Shot.description: Use of Dead-Eye Shot must be declared at the start of the round. Nothings happens at this time. At the end of the round, the user may use their Shift Action, and then make a Ranged Weapon Attack and roll twice for Accuracy. You may resolve the attack using either result, but if you choose to use the lower result and the attack hits, it is automatically a Critical Hit.

Aura Mastery.name: Aura Mastery
Aura Mastery.description: Choose two of Aura Sphere, Focus Blast, Drain Punch, or Focus Punch. You learn the chosen Moves.

Survivalist.name: Survivalist
Survivalist.description: Choose a Terrain in which you have spent at least three nights. You gain Naturewalk for that terrain and a +2 bonus to Athletics, Acrobatics, Stealth, Perception, and Survival Checks in that terrain. When you have 2 Sur- vivalist Features, you may choose a second Terrain. When you have 4 Survivalist Features, you may choose a third terrain. When you have 6 Survivalist Features, you may choose a fourth terrain.

Fossil Restoration.name: Fossil Restoration
Fossil Restoration.description: The resulting Pokemon is born with 2 fewer Tutor Points, and gains its second Basic Ability. If it has only has one Basic Ability, it gains one of its Advanced Abilities, chosen by the GM. This Feature does not affect how the Pokemon continues to gain Abilities.

Miasmic.name: Miasmic
Miasmic.description: You learn the Moves Acid and Clear Smog.

Fiery Soul.name: Fiery Soul
Fiery Soul.description: You gain the Heater Capability, and are immune to the Burn condition.

Terrain Talent.name: Terrain Talent
Terrain Talent.description: Each Rank, you gain two Terrain Talents, chosen from the Terrains for which you gained Naturewalk from Survivalist.

Lockdown.name: Lockdown
Lockdown.description: For 1 full round, that foe is instead Stuck and may only use At-Will Frequency Moves.

Warping Ground.name: Warping Ground
Warping Ground.description: You learn the Moves Gravity and Trick.

Pact Gift - Hyper Beam.name: Pact Gift - Hyper Beam
Pact Gift - Hyper Beam.description: You learn the Move Hyper Beam.

Smart Scheme.name: Smart Scheme
Smart Scheme.description: Your Pokemon with at least 3d6 in their Smart Stat from Poffins may activate Smart Scheme as a Standard Action to perform one of the following Moves. They must still follow frequency limits as usual for these Moves.

Case Specialist.name: Case Specialist
Case Specialist.description:
The Case has additional effects according to its type(s).
>Spray Case
>Flash Case
>Bounce Case
>Zap Case

Major Gift - Time Stop.name: Major Gift - Time Stop
Major Gift - Time Stop.description: Take an additional Shift Action and Standard Action.

Enduring Bloom.name: Enduring Bloom
Enduring Bloom.description: Your Pokemon gains Temporary Hit Points equal to twice your Type-Linked Skill Rank, and gains +1 Combat Stage in the Stat of your choice. If it is Sunny, they may gain +1 Combat Stage in a second, different Stat. You may activate Enduring Bloom only once per Scene per Pokemon.

Miasmic Spray.name: Miasmic Spray
Miasmic Spray.description:
The Effect of this feature depends on the triggering move.
>Acid
>Clear Smog
>Sludge Bomb
>Sludge Wave
>Toxic
>Acid Armor

Vampirism.name: Vampirism
Vampirism.description: Choose a Stat. The triggering foe loses a Tick of Hit Points and a Combat Stage in that Stat. Your Pokemon gains 1 Combat Stage in the chosen Stat, and a Tick of Temporary Hit Points.

This One's Special, I Know It.name: This One's Special, I Know It
This One's Special, I Know It.description: The Pokemon is born with special qualities, determined by the GM. This Feature may be activated one time per Pokemon Education Rank above Untrained.

Dance Practice.name: Dance Practice
Dance Practice.description: The target loses 2 Tutor Points and gains your choice of Spinning Dance or Own Tempo. Dance Practice may target a Pokemon only once.

Dirty Fighting.name: Dirty Fighting
Dirty Fighting.description: After the attack is Resolved, you may immediately use the Dirty Trick Maneuver if the target is within range. You automatically hit with Dirty Trick, but must still make an Opposed Roll.
prereqs: a Rogue Skill at Adept Rank

Herald of Pride.name: Herald of Pride
Herald of Pride.description: When wielding Melee Weapons, you may use Command or Intimidate instead of Combat to determine the Damage Base of your Struggle Attacks, to resist Disarm Maneuvers, and to qualify for a Weapon's Moves. Your Weapon Attacks ignore Damage Reduction up to your Command or Intimidate Rank.

Burning Passion.name: Burning Passion
Burning Passion.description: Choose Flash Fire or Flame Body. You gain the chosen Ability.

Earth Shaker.name: Earth Shaker
Earth Shaker.description: Pick two of Bulldoze, Mud Shot, or Sand-Attack. You learn the chosen Moves.

Press.name: Press
Press.description: You hit your Pokemon, and they lose 1/6th of their Max Hit Points and are cured of Sleep. Raise any two of their Stats by +1 CS each, and you may add half of your Intimidate Rank to any Skill Checks made this round to make this Pokemon obey orders. Using Press on a Pokemon may make them dislike you.

Caustic Chemistry.name: Caustic Chemistry
Caustic Chemistry.description: Make a Technology Education Roll. All targets affected by this Feature's trigger lose Hit Points equal to your roll. This may only affect a target once per Scene.

Hunter's Reflexes.name: Hunter's Reflexes
Hunter's Reflexes.description: You and your Pokemon may make up to three Attacks of Opportunity each round, instead of only one. Additionally, your attacks always consider you to be adjacent to your target for the purposes of benefiting from your Pokemon's Teamwork Ability, and count as Melee attacks for the purposes of triggering their Pack Hunt Ability.

Berserker.name: Berserker
Berserker.description: You learn the Moves Rage and Flail. You may use these moves as a Weapon Attack when wielding Melee Weapons.

Mixed Messages.name: Mixed Messages
Mixed Messages.description: You learn the Moves Lovely Kiss and Torment.
prereqs: two Provocateur Skills at Adept Rank

Steel Wind.name: Steel Wind
Steel Wind.description: You learn the Moves Bullet Punch and Metal Claw. You may use these Moves as Weapon Attacks when wielding Melee Weapons.

Roughneck.name: Roughneck
Roughneck.description: The foe loses a Combat Stage in the Stat of your choice.

Climate Control.name: Climate Control
Climate Control.description: The triggering Weather Effect does not replace the already extant Weather in effect; both exist simultaneously on the field. If a new Weather effect is placed on the field after the two that are out, both are replaced by the third, unless you activate this Feature again to replace only one.

Glacial Ice.name: Glacial Ice
Glacial Ice.description: Your Ice-Type Pokemon gain Damage Reduction equal to your Type-Linked Skill Rank against Fighting, Fire, Rock, and Steel-Typed Attacks from which they would take Super-Effective Damage.

Outmaneuver.name: Outmaneuver
Outmaneuver.description: Add half your Evasion to your Accuracy Roll for the attack, and all foes hit by the attack have their Initia- tive reduced by your full Evasion value.

Sacred Shield.name: Sacred Shield
Sacred Shield.description: You learn the Moves Reflect and Lucky Chant.

Cheers.name: Cheers
Cheers.description: The target or targets of the triggering [Orders] are Cheered for 1 full round. While Cheered, the target's Combat Stages cannot be lowered by foe's attacks, features, or abilities. This Feature costs 0 AP if the triggering effect affects only one ally, and costs 1 AP if it affects two or more.

Complex Aftertaste.name: Complex Aftertaste
Complex Aftertaste.description: The target gains a Digestion Buff according to the Taste of the Snack granting the Buff. This Digestion Buff matches that of the corresponding basic Tasty Snack recipe.

Death From Above.name: Death From Above
Death From Above.description: You learn the Moves Acrobatics and Bounce.

Top Tier Berries.name: Top Tier Berries
Top Tier Berries.description:
You may grow additional Berries and Herbs, depending on the higher of your General Education or Survival Rank.
> Novice
> Adept
> Expert
> Master

Quick Switch.name: Quick Switch
Quick Switch.description: You may return and send out a Pokemon as a Free Action. You may perform this Feature on your turn without a Trigger. Pokemon sent out by Quick Switch cannot trigger another Trainer's Quick Switch. When you swap Pokemon using Quick Switch, you do not lose a Pokemon turn.

Adaptable Performance.name: Adaptable Performance
Adaptable Performance.description: Choose two of your Pokemon's Moves. Your Pokemon may perform your Contest Move as if had the Contest Typing of one of your chosen Moves, and had the effects of the other. You may not use either move on the next round of the contest. This effect may be used once per Contest.

Flip Out.name: Flip Out
Flip Out.description:
Your Tumbler Moves gain additional effects.
> Aerial Ace
> Splash
> Acrobatics
> Bounce

First Aid Expertise.name: First Aid Expertise
First Aid Expertise.description: The target may remove one Injury, has all Hit Points restored, and is cured of all Status Afflictions. You may use First Aid Expertise only once per day per target. First Aid Expertise requires access to a First Aid Kit.

Major Gift - Searing Blade.name: Major Gift - Searing Blade
Major Gift - Searing Blade.description: Your next Struggle Attack with an equipped weapon deals +2 Damage Steps and deals Fire Type damage.

Black-Out Strike.name: Black-Out Strike
Black-Out Strike.description: After the triggering attack is resolved, the target of the attack gains an Injury and falls asleep. If this attack would put them are 3 or more injuries or at or under 25% of their maximum Hit Points, the target instead becomes Fainted. Black-Out Strike may be used only once per Scene.

Cool Conduct.name: Cool Conduct
Cool Conduct.description: Your Pokemon with at least 3d6 in their Cool Stat from Poffins may activate Cool Conduct as a Standard Action to perform one of the following Moves. They must still follow frequency limits as usual for these Moves.

Shadow Arms.name: Shadow Arms
Shadow Arms.description: You learn the Moves Shadow Punch and Shad- ow Sneak. You may use these as Weapon Attacks when wielding Melee Weapons.

Provocateur.name: Provocateur
Provocateur.description: You learn the Moves Sweet Kiss and Taunt.

Heart of Darkness.name: Heart of Darkness
Heart of Darkness.description: You learn Night Daze and Punishment

Channel the Dragon's Spirit.name: Channel the Dragon's Spirit
Channel the Dragon's Spirit.description: You may have the triggering attack deal Dragon- Type Damage if you wish. On 18+, all targets can only use At-Will Frequency Moves for one full round

Let Me Help You With That.name: Let Me Help You With That
Let Me Help You With That.description: The ally may re-roll the Skill Check with a Bonus equal to your Skill Rank.

Round Trip.name: Round Trip
Round Trip.description: You may immediately switch your Pokemon that just performed a Move for another of your Pokemon. This effect lets Pokemon with the Trapped condition switch out.

Wall of Iron.name: Wall of Iron
Wall of Iron.description: You learn the moves Iron Defense and Protect.

Guardian's Punishment.name: Guardian's Punishment
Guardian's Punishment.description: Add your Defense Stat to the Damage Roll. The Marked Foe takes a penalty to Damage Rolls equal to your Combat or Focus Rank for 1 full round.

Water's Shroud.name: Water's Shroud
Water's Shroud.description: Choose Wash Away or Storm Drain. You gain the Chosen Ability.

Druid.name: Druid
Druid.description: Your powers begin to take after either Flowers, Fungi, or Trees. Depending on your oath, you gain an Ability and Stat Tags. Whenever you gain a Druid Feature, you gain the same Stat Tags.

Engineer.name: Engineer
Engineer.description: You may craft any Engineer Recipe for which you qualify.

Awareness.name: Awareness
Awareness.description: Your Pokemon add +2 to all Save Checks.

Unveiled Sight.name: Unveiled Sight
Unveiled Sight.description: You can see through Illusions. This means you can spot Illusions from the Illusionist capability, Illusion Ability, and Genjutsu Feature as being fake. You are immune to Moves with the Illusion keyword, Double Team cannot be activated against you, and you bypass Substitutes. As a Standard Action, you can create a Burst 4, dispelling all Illusion effects within.

Rune Master.name: Rune Master
Rune Master.description: You gain the Gather Unown capability, and your Unown gain the Letter Press Capability. When using Gather Unown, you are treated as a level 20 Pokemon.

Major Gift - Sacred Sword.name: Major Gift - Sacred Sword
Major Gift - Sacred Sword.description: You learn the Move Sacred Sword.

Macho Charge.name: Macho Charge
Macho Charge.description: In Contests: Treat the Move as if it were one step more aligned with the Contest Type. If the Move would be opposing the Contest Type, it is instead neutral. If it is neutral, it is instead matching. You may activate this effect only once per Contest.

Mental Assault.name: Mental Assault
Mental Assault.description: You learn the Moves Extrasensory and Psyshock.

Pact Gift - Bolt Strike.name: Pact Gift - Bolt Strike
Pact Gift - Bolt Strike.description: You learn the Move Bolt Strike.
prereqs: All Zekrom and Shared Tao Trio Major Gifts

Stone Stance.name: Stone Stance
Stone Stance.description:
You adopt one of the stances below, gaining the effects of the stance while this Feature remains bound. You may switch your active Stance as a Standard Action without rebinding your AP. The benefits from this Feature do not apply if you are not standing on a solid surface, such as deep mud or snow, or if you are outright swimming or even flying.
>Falling Boulder Stance
>Moon Mountain Stance
>Roiling Earth Stance

Usurper.name: Usurper
Usurper.description: Your human form is now considered your Avatar, and you gain a second set of stats for your Pokemon form. This form is that of the Legendary you usurped, starts at level 1 with the nature and abilities of your choice, and may gain experience as if it were a Pokemon you owned. Switching between your human form and this one takes a Standard Action. Usurpers cannot receive Gifts or Blessings from other Legendaries, as they are divinity themselves now. Any Touched, Branded, Messiah, and Signer Edges and Features you possessed up until this point are refunded. The Patron Stats for this Feature and all other Usurper Features matches the stats of the Legendary you Usurped.
prereqs: You have slain a God and through occult ritual or technology have absorbed its essence.

Major Gift - Primal Craftsmanship.name: Major Gift - Primal Craftsmanship
Major Gift - Primal Craftsmanship.description: You pay 20% less when crafting items.
prereqs: Minor Gift - Hands of the Creator

Cross-Pollinate.name: Cross-Pollinate
Cross-Pollinate.description: Your Pokemon may immediately use a Grass- Type Status-Class move as a Free Action.

Enduring Soul.name: Enduring Soul
Enduring Soul.description: You may add to your Pokemon's HP stat when they level up, ignoring Base Relation, and you do not need to \

Rogue.name: Rogue
Rogue.description: You learn the Moves Feint Attack and Thief.

Simple Improvements.name: Simple Improvements
Simple Improvements.description: Add your Type-Linked Skill Rank to all of your Pokemon's rolls this turn. Your Pokemon gains Temporary Hit Points equal to twice your Type-Linked Skill Rank. Simple Improvements may only be used once per Scene per Pokemon.

Telepathic Warning.name: Telepathic Warning
Telepathic Warning.description: You're able to give your allies heed of attacks. All allies that would be hit by the attack may take a Shift Action as an Interrupt to move out of the area of effect of the attack. Using this leaves discoverable Psychic Residue on each affected ally. You may only use Telepathic Warning as long as you have the Telepath Capability.

Honed Mind.name: Honed Mind
Honed Mind.description: You learn the Moves Mind Reader and Calm Mind.

Extra Ordinary.name: Extra Ordinary
Extra Ordinary.description: Your Pokemon gains the Last Chance or Normal Strategist Ability, whichever one they do not already have. Extra Ordinary can target a Pokemon only once.

Rainbow Surge.name: Rainbow Surge
Rainbow Surge.description: You learn the Moves Hyper Beam and Morning Sun.

Pact Gift - Land's Wrath.name: Pact Gift - Land's Wrath
Pact Gift - Land's Wrath.description: You learn the Move Land's Wrath.

Martial Training.name: Martial Training
Martial Training.description: Learn two Martial Artist Moves. You may choose any Move marked with the Martial Training Rank you are taking or lower. You must meet a Move's Prerequisites to choose that Move.

Inspirational Support.name: Inspirational Support
Inspirational Support.description: Whenever your Pokemon with Friend Guard targets an Ally with an Ability or Status Move, the targeted Ally becomes Cheered.

Glamour Weaver.name: Glamour Weaver
Glamour Weaver.description: You learn the Moves Sweet Kiss and Disarming Voice.

Overwatch.name: Overwatch
Overwatch.description: Create a Line X, and place a Blast 3 with at least three meters overlapping the Line's area. X is equal to your Weapon's Range. For one full round, if a foe moves in or out of that area, you may make a Ranged Weapon attack, Frequency allowing, against that foe as a Free Ac- tion. You may not attack a specific foe more than once per round this way. While this is in effect, if you Move from your current location, Overwatch's effect is lost.

Glacial Defense.name: Glacial Defense
Glacial Defense.description: Choose Ice Shield or Winter's Kiss. You gain the Chosen Ability.

Gift of Power.name: Gift of Power
Gift of Power.description: You gift your target with a Blessing of your own. Whether this makes them Touched, a Signer, or Branded is at your digression. The actual Blessings may not need be the one listed here for your Legendary Form, but ones of your own creation at your GM's discretion.

Overclock.name: Overclock
Overclock.description: The target is cured of all Persistent Statuses, resets all negative Combat Stages to default, and gains two Ticks of Temporary Hit Points. For the rest of the Scene, it deals and takes additional damage with all attacks equal to your Technology Education Rank.

Major Gift - Tower's Blessing.name: Major Gift - Tower's Blessing
Major Gift - Tower's Blessing.description: Trigger: You or your Pokemon use a Move with the Blessing Keyword

Godslayer.name: Godslayer
Godslayer.description: You may attempt to shatter one of the target's Legendary Auras. The AC of this action is 10. If you successfully disabled the Aura, but rolled a 10-15, the feedback from the action gives you an Injury.

Ramming Speed.name: Ramming Speed
Ramming Speed.description: The target loses 2 Tutor Points and gains the Run Up Ability.

Street Fighter.name: Street Fighter
Street Fighter.description: You learn the Moves Assurance and Payback.
prereqs: two Rogue Skills at Expert Rank

Quick Healing.name: Quick Healing
Quick Healing.description: Your Hardened Pokemon may use Quick Healing to remove up to three injuries, and gains two Ticks of Hit Points for each Injury removed this way.

Shards of Stone.name: Shards of Stone
Shards of Stone.description: You learn the Moves Rock Slide and Stealth Rock

Insectoid Utility.name: Insectoid Utility
Insectoid Utility.description:
Your Pokemon with the following Capabilities have the upgrades below applied to them.
> Threaded
> Wallclimber
> Naturewalk

Branded.name: Branded
Branded.description: You have made a contract with a deity or other supernatural being and have been Branded for it. This Brand may or may not be of your choosing. The other party will uphold their side of the deal and expects you to do the same. Other Legendaries may be wary to grant you Gifts in the future based on the contents of this contract. Your Patron Stats for this feature are those of the being you made your contract with. If this being was not a typical Legendary, its Patron Stats are its two highest base stats.

Major Gift - Water Absorb.name: Major Gift - Water Absorb
Major Gift - Water Absorb.description: You gain the Water Absorb Ability.

Pact Gift - Geomancy.name: Pact Gift - Geomancy
prereqs: All Xerneas Major Gifts and Shared Mortality Duo Gifts

Pact Gift - Slayer of the False Gods.name: Pact Gift - Slayer of the False Gods

Miasma.name: Miasma
Miasma.description: Your Pokemon may use either Smokescreen or Poison Gas as if they were on their Move List. When used this way, these Moves ignore Frequency Limitations, and are used as a Ranged Blast 3, with the blast centered on the square targeted by the triggering attack. Poison-Type Pokemon are not negatively affected by Smoke Screens created this way. Your Pokemon may also trigger Miasma deliberately as a Standard Action.

Musical Ability.name: Musical Ability
Musical Ability.description: Choose Drown Out or Soundproof. You gain the chosen Ability.

Leadership.name: Leadership
Leadership.description: You may use [Orders] that have targets to target any Ally, even if normally those [Orders] would only let you apply the effect to your own Pokemon. Any other conditions still apply.

Iterative Evolution.name: Iterative Evolution
Iterative Evolution.description: While this Feature is bound, if your Pokemon's Bug-Type attack would deal Super-Effective Damage, it gains a +2 Bonus to Accuracy Check. If it would deal Neutral Damage, it gains a Bonus to its Damage Roll equal to your Type-Linked Skill Rank. If it would be resisted, it is resisted one step less. This is calculated after applying any other effects that would modify effectiveness before the Accuracy Roll is made, such as the Tinted Lens Ability.

Luminous Aura.name: Luminous Aura
Luminous Aura.description: Choose Starlight or Sunglow. You gain the Chosen Ability.

Passing Waltz.name: Passing Waltz
Passing Waltz.description: Choose an ally within 3 meters of the triggering target. That ally gains Combat Stages from the triggering Move instead of the user.

Major Gift - Clear Body.name: Major Gift - Clear Body
Major Gift - Clear Body.description: You gain the Clear Body Ability.

Major Gift - Luster Purge.name: Major Gift - Luster Purge
Major Gift - Luster Purge.description: You learn the Move Luster Purge.

Power of the Mind.name: Power of the Mind
Power of the Mind.description: Choose Interference or Levitate. You gain the chosen Ability.

Major Gift - Volt Absorb.name: Major Gift - Volt Absorb
Major Gift - Volt Absorb.description: You gain the Volt Absorb Ability.

Dilettante.name: Dilettante
Dilettante.description: Each Rank of Dilettante, you gain both an Edge and a General Feature from the lists below. You may gain the chosen Edge and Feature even if you do not meet the Skill prerequisites. You must meet any other Prerequisites. Whenever you gain a Feature or Edge this way, change any Skill Rank applications or Skill Checks mandated directly by the Edge or Feature into your choice of General Education or Perception Skill Checks or Rank applications instead.

Juggling Show.name: Juggling Show
Juggling Show.description: You may roll an additional Xd6 during the In- troduction Stage of a Contest, where X is half of your Acrobatics Rank. You may choose any Contest Stat to attempt to gain Dice for with this roll.

The Cold Never Bothered Me Anyway.name: The Cold Never Bothered Me Anyway
The Cold Never Bothered Me Anyway.description: You gain the Naturewalk (Tundra) Capability, are immune to being Frozen, and do not lose Hit Points from Hail.

Pack Tactics.name: Pack Tactics
Pack Tactics.description: The target loses 2 Tutor Points, and gains the Pack Hunt or Teamwork Ability. You may target a Pokemon with Pack Tactics only once.

Sleight.name: Sleight
Sleight.description: Your Pokemon may activate Sleight as an Interrupt to immediately take their turn and use a Status- Class Move as a Standard Action. If this Move targets a foe, it ignores Substitute and Defensive Abilities, and Blessings may not be activated against the Move.

Utility Drop.name: Utility Drop
Utility Drop.description: You may use a Smoke Ball, Caltrops, or Toxic Caltrops as a Free action during your Shift. Instead of the Move's usual area of effect, you leave one square of Smokescreen, Spikes, or Toxic Spikes on each square you leave as you Shift. Once you place 8 meters of Smoke, Spikes, or Toxic Spikes you may not place any more.

Stacked Deck.name: Stacked Deck
Stacked Deck.description: Choose a Status Affliction or condition the triggering target is suffering from; the target suffers an additional effect according to the table below. Stacked Deck may only affect a foe once per Scene.

Duelist's Manual.name: Duelist's Manual
Duelist's Manual.description:
Apply one of the following effects. To choose an effect, your Pokemon must have a certain amount of Momentum. (Duelist's Manual does not spend Momentum).
> 1 Momentum
> 2 Momentum
> 3 Momentum

Gleeful Steps.name: Gleeful Steps
Gleeful Steps.description: In Contests: Treat the Move as if it were one step more aligned with the Contest Type. If the Move would be opposing the Contest Type, it is instead neutral. If it is neutral, it is instead matching. You may activate this effect only once per Contest.

Gotta Catch 'Em All.name: Gotta Catch 'Em All
Gotta Catch 'Em All.description: Every time you Capture a Wild Pokemon that is a member of an evolutionary family of which you own no other Pokemon, you gain 1 Collector Stack. Whenever you make a Capture Roll, you may spend up to three Collector Stacks to gain an equal bonus to your Capture Roll, or you may spend three Collector Stacks to re-roll entirely.

Magical Burst.name: Magical Burst
Magical Burst.description: Use a Glamour Weaver Move as if it had the range Burst 3, Friendly, Exhaust, Smite. All allies within the area-of-effect gain a Tick of Temporary Hit Points or cure themselves of one Volatile Affliction. Enchanting Transformation immediately becomes Unbound, and the AP used to bind it becomes spent instead of becoming available again.

Glitch Shuffle.name: Glitch Shuffle
Glitch Shuffle.description: You learn the Moves Metronome and Topsy- Turvy

Major Gift - Blaze Armor.name: Major Gift - Blaze Armor
Major Gift - Blaze Armor.description: You take damage from the next Attack that hits you as if you were Fire Type. If the Attack was made in melee range, your attacker loses 1/8th of their maximum HP as a Fire Type effect. Apply weakness and resistance. Do not apply stats.

Dancer (Feature).name: Dancer
Dancer (Feature).description: Choose Spinning Dance or Own Tempo. You gain the chosen Ability.
prereqs: Novice Acrobatics; Novice Athletics or Charm

Fairy Lights.name: Fairy Lights
Fairy Lights.description: Your Fairy-Type Pokemon may activate Fairy Lights as a Standard Action to create 3 Fairy Lights that hover around themselves. Whenever the target is attacked by a foe within 6 meters, they may expend a Fairy Light to either immediately gain a Tick of Temporary Hit Points, or to use the Move Fairy Wind as a Free Action.

Ace Trainer.name: Ace Trainer
Ace Trainer.description: For each Pokemon that has been Trained during this time, choose a Stat besides HP; that Stat becomes Trained until an Extended Rest is taken. The default State of Trained Stats is +1 Combat Stages instead of 0. A Pokemon may have only one Trained Stat at a time.

Inspired Training.name: Inspired Training
Inspired Training.description: The target becomes Inspired until the end of the effect duration. Inspired Pokemon gain a +1 bonus to Evasion and +2 to Save Checks.

Chain Lightning.name: Chain Lightning
Chain Lightning.description: Pick another Pokemon or Trainer within 3 meters of the target of the attack. You may repeat the triggering attack against the target, with a -5 Damage penalty. If you hit, you may repeat the attack a third time against a foe within 3 meters of the second target, this time with a -10 Damage penalty. The third target cannot be the same as the original target.

Force of Will.name: Force of Will
