Force of Will.description: Your Pokemon may immediately use another Psychic-Type Status Move from its Move List with a range of Blessing, Field, Hazard, or Self.

Aura Reader (Feature).name: Aura Reader (Feature)
Aura Reader (Feature).description: You gain the Aura Reader Capability for the rest of the scene. If your Intuition is Adept Rank or higher, you also gain the Aura Pulse Capability.

Thought Detection.name: Thought Detection
Thought Detection.description: You become aware of the number of living Humans or Pokemon within X meters of yourself; X is equal to your Focus Rank tripled. Pokemon or Trainers with the Mindlock Capability are not detected by this Ability. You may only use Thought Detection as long as you have the Telepathy Capability.

Backpacker.name: Backpacker
Backpacker.description: You gain the Skill Enhancement Edge. You then gain an instance of the Skill Stunt Edge for each of the two Skills you chose with Skill Enhancement.

Moment of Action.name: Moment of Action
Moment of Action.description: Each target gains 1 Temporary Action Point. These Action Points disappear after one full Round.

Hero's Journey.name: Hero's Journey
Hero's Journey.description: Each Rank, you may gain two Backpacker Talents for which you qualify.

Winter's Herald.name: Winter's Herald
Winter's Herald.description: You may learn two Moves from the list below, marked with the Rank of Winter's Herald you are gaining or lower.

Soul Investment.name: Soul Investment
Soul Investment.description: Choose one Novice and one Expert Arcane Weapon Move. Your Soul Bonded Weapon adds those Moves to your Move List as long as this Feature is Bound. You may only Bind one instance of this Feature at a time, and you may not have multiple instances of the same Move in your Move List.

Frenzy.name: Frenzy
Frenzy.description: You may immediately take your turn with Priority. If you do, you are instantly cured of Slowed and Stuck, and for the rest of this turn gain a +2 Bonus to Critical Hit Range, +2 Bonus to Movement Speed, and +2 Bonus to Acrobatics, Athletics, Combat, and Intimidate Checks.

Swift Strikes.name: Swift Strikes
Swift Strikes.description: Use a Weapon Attack as if it had the Priority Key- word. If the Move already had the Priority Keyword, use it as if it had the Priority (Advanced) Keyword instead.

Storm Wizard.name: Storm Wizard
Storm Wizard.description: You may learn two Moves from the list below, marked with the Storm Wizard Rank you are gaining or lower.

Efficient Installation.name: Efficient Installation
Efficient Installation.description: You and your Pokemon gain a +2 boost to their maximum Augmentation Capacity and count their used Capacity as 2 lower for the purposes of Augmentation Shock. You and your Pokemon can install multiple Augmentations in the same Slot.

Pact Gift - Glaciate.name: Pact Gift - Glaciate
prereqs: All Kyurem and Shared Tao Trio Major Gifts

Major Gift - Sprouter.name: Major Gift - Sprouter
prereqs: Minor Gift - Catastrophe Sense OR Minor Gift - Plant Intuition

Pact Gift - Roar of Time.name: Pact Gift - Roar of Time
Pact Gift - Roar of Time.description: You learn the Move Roar of Time.
prereqs: All Dialga and Shared Creation Trio Major Gifts

Well Read.name: Well Read
Well Read.description: You may use your General Education Rank to qualify for Books, instead of the Book's usual Skill Prerequisites, provided you have the normal Prerequisite at at least Novice Rank.

Mental Resistance.name: Mental Resistance
Mental Resistance.description: You gain the Mindlock Capability and 10 Damage Reduction against Special Psychic, Ghost, and Dark-Type damage.

The Power of Aura.name: The Power of Aura
The Power of Aura.description: Each Rank, choose Scrappy or Aura Storm. You gain the Chosen Ability.

Aura Guardian.name: Aura Guardian
Aura Guardian.description: Choose two of Detect, Vacuum Wave, or Force Palm. You learn the chosen Moves.

Tag In.name: Tag In
Tag In.description: The next Pokemon you send out is treated as if the recalled Pokemon had used Baton Pass on it.

Bare the Dragon's Claws.name: Bare the Dragon's Claws
Bare the Dragon's Claws.description: Your learn the Moves Dragon Claw and Dragon Tail. You may use these Moves as Weapon Attacks when wielding Melee Weapons.

Major Gift - Gentle Vibe.name: Major Gift - Gentle Vibe
Major Gift - Gentle Vibe.description: You gain the Gentle Vibe Ability.

Marksman Orders.name: Marksman Orders
Marksman Orders.description: You gain the Trick Shot and Long Shot Orders.

Mindbreak.name: Mindbreak
Mindbreak.description: While this Feature is Bound, the target's damaging Psychic-Type Moves gain a +1 Bonus to Effect Range and a +3 Bonus to Damage Rolls for each of the following conditions that the target is suffering: Bad Sleep, Confusion, Curse, Disabled, Flinch, Infatuation, Rage, or Suppression.

Bookworm.name: Bookworm
Bookworm.description: You gain X Study Points, where X is equal to 2 plus one more for every other General Research Feature you have. You may Drain Study Points to benefit from studying Books, instead of Draining your Action Points. Study Points are restored to your maximum after an Extended Rest, just like Action Points.

Malice.name: Malice
Malice.description: You learn the Moves Mean Look and Chip Away.

Focused Command.name: Focused Command
Focused Command.description: You may have a second Pokemon take a turn this round, but both Pokemon can only take At-Will actions that round. Additionally, both Pokemon receive a -5 Penalty on all Damage Rolls. You may pay 1 AP at the beginning of the round to lift the Frequency Restriction OR the Damage Penalty for the remainder of the round, or pay 2 AP to lift both.

Cacophony.name: Cacophony
Cacophony.description: You learn the Moves Screech and Metal Sound.

My Kung-Fu is Stronger.name: My Kung-Fu is Stronger
My Kung-Fu is Stronger.description: You may use Rock Smash instead of an unarmed Struggle Attack. If you do, Rock Smash's Effect Range is increased by +2.

Body of Lightning.name: Body of Lightning
Body of Lightning.description: Choose Volt Absorb or Motor Drive. You gain the Chosen Ability.

I Am Error.name: I Am Error
I Am Error.description: Roll 1d10 and change which Status Affliction is gained according to the following chart. If the target already has that Status Affliction, roll again.

Major Gift - Victory Star.name: Major Gift - Victory Star
Major Gift - Victory Star.description: You gain the Victory Star Ability.

Major Gift - Probability Control.name: Major Gift - Probability Control
Major Gift - Probability Control.description: You gain the Probability Control Ability.
prereqs: Minor Gift - Catastrophe Sense OR Minor Gift - Perfect Timing

Move Tutor.name: Move Tutor
Move Tutor.description: The target loses 2 Tutor Points, and learns any move from its Tutor List.
prereqs: one Mentor Skill at Expert Rank

Sunlight Within.name: Sunlight Within
Sunlight Within.description: While this Stratagem is bound, your Pokemon may activate Moves and Abilities as if they were in Sunny Weather.

Brawler.name: Brawler
Brawler.description: This Struggle Attack has a range of Burst 1, Friendly instead of the usual range, and deals Fighting- Type Damage.

Rewrite.name: Rewrite
Rewrite.description: Reroll the Type for an instance of Hidden Pow- er the target knows If you target an Unown, you may transform the target into a different letter.

Savage Strike.name: Savage Strike
Savage Strike.description: The target loses 2 Tutor Points, and gains the Cruelty Ability.

Plainly Perfect.name: Plainly Perfect
Plainly Perfect.description: While this Feature is bound, instead of rolling for damage with Normal-Type Moves, your Pokemon acts as if they rolled the maximum value on their Damage Dice Roll. Plainly Perfect only works for the first instance of the Damage Dice Roll on Critical Hits.

Fishbowl Technique.name: Fishbowl Technique
Fishbowl Technique.description: While this Stratagem is bound, your Pokemon may activate Moves and Abilities as if they were in Rainy Weather.

Desert Heart.name: Desert Heart
Desert Heart.description: While this Stratagem is bound, your Pokemon may activate Moves and Abilities as if they were in a Sandstorm.

Rock Power.name: Rock Power
Rock Power.description: Each Rank, choose one of Sturdy, Rock Head, Run Up, or Sand Veil. You gain the chosen Ability. If you choose Sand Veil, you may consider sand a \

Major Gift - Drain Will.name: Major Gift - Drain Will
Major Gift - Drain Will.description: Target: Pokemon or Trainer within 8 meters

Stone Warrior.name: Stone Warrior
Stone Warrior.description: You learn the Moves Rock Tomb and Wide Guard.

Weapon Finesse.name: Weapon Finesse
Weapon Finesse.description: After the attack is resolved, you may immediate- ly use a Disarm, Trip, or Push Maneuver against that foe as a Free Action. The Maneuver automatically hits, but you must still make an Opposed Roll.

Focused Training.name: Focused Training
Focused Training.description: The target becomes Focused until the end of the effect duration. Focused Pokemon gain a +1 bonus to Accuracy Rolls and +2 to Skill Checks.

Devious.name: Devious
Devious.description: Your Pokemon may immediately use a naturally Dark-Typed Status-Class Move or a Move with the Social keyword as a Free Action. This must be a different Move than the triggering Move, and must follow all Frequency limitations. Devious may be used only once per Scene per Pokemon.

Fey Law.name: Fey Law
Fey Law.description: Choose one of the following: Status-Class, Combat Maneuver, attacks with an unmodified Damage Base 10 or higher, or an Elemental Type. The triggering foe is Bound; they suffer a -X penalty to all rolls made to use attacks with the chosen trait. X is equal to half your Charm or Occult Education Rank. The Bound condition lasts until the end of a Scene. You may unbind someone as a Free Action at any time. A target may not have multiple instances of Bound applied at once.
Fey Law.frequency: You hit a foe with a damaging Fairy attack
Fey Law.trigger: You hit a foe with a damaging Fairy attack

Blazing Inferno.name: Blazing Inferno
Blazing Inferno.description: You becoming Blazing. While you are Blaz- ing, whenever your Fire-Type Moves Inflict Burn, the Burned target immediately loses a Tick of Hit Points, and loses an additional Combat Stage in Defense. While Blazing, when you hit a foe with a damaging Fire-Type Move, you may choose to automatically burn one target of the Move. If you do, you lose the Blazing Condition after the Move's effects are resolved.

Alarm Runes.name: Alarm Runes
Alarm Runes.description: You give the Glyph a Trigger, which may be as vague or as precise as you like (i.e.: \

Fusion Cases.name: Fusion Cases
Fusion Cases.description: You combine two different Poke Ball Cases into a single Fusion Case with both effects and types. Fusion Cases may not be used as Ingredients for this Feature.

Enhanced Capsules.name: Enhanced Capsules
Enhanced Capsules.description:
Choose one of the Capabilities below which the target Pokemon has. You create a consumable item with the effect below, depending on the chosen Capability. All unused items created with Enhanced Capsules are rendered inert after an Extended Rest (including modifications to other items).
>Glow
>Magnetic
>Threaded
>Zapper

Telekinetic Burst.name: Telekinetic Burst
Telekinetic Burst.description:
The effect of this Feature depends on the Triggering Move.
> Kinesis
> Barrier
> Psychic
> Telekinesis

Skill Trainer.name: Skill Trainer
Skill Trainer.description: For each of your Pokemon that has been Trained during this time, choose a Skill; that Skill becomes Pushed until an Extended Rest is taken. Pokemon rolls +1d6 with Pushed Skills, unless that would cause you to roll more than 6d6; if so, that Pokemon rolls with a +3 Bonus instead. A Pokemon may have only one Pushed Skill at a time.

Harrier.name: Harrier
Harrier.description: Until the end of your next turn, that foe is con- sidered Flanked, is Slowed, and cannot take actions as Priority or Interrupt. Harrier may only be used on a foe once per Scene.

Major Gift - Winter's Kiss.name: Major Gift - Winter's Kiss
Major Gift - Winter's Kiss.description: You gain the Winter's Kiss Ability.
prereqs: Minor Gift - Elemental Soul OR Major Gift - The Empty Tao

Dietician.name: Dietician
Dietician.description: Your Pokemon can benefit from a maximum of 7 Vitamins.

Cute Cuddle.name: Cute Cuddle
Cute Cuddle.description: Your Pokemon with at least 3d6 in their Cute Stat from Poffins may activate Cute Cuddle as a Standard Action to perform one of the following Moves. They must still follow frequency limits as usual for these Moves.

Tip the Scales.name: Tip the Scales
Tip the Scales.description: Your [Orders] with an At-Will Frequency instead target all allies within 10 Meters.

Farcast.name: Farcast
Farcast.description: Choose One: You activate Teleporter as if your Teleporter value were three times its normal value or you may take one willing Pokemon or Trainer along with you as you teleport so long as you are touching them when you activate Farcast. You may expend two uses of Farcast at once to choose both effects.

Battle Conductor.name: Battle Conductor
Battle Conductor.description: You may target up to two additional Allies with the [Orders].

Defender.name: Defender
Defender.description: Using the Intercept Maneuvers requires only a Shift Action Interrupt.

Commander.name: Commander
Commander.description: Choose one of Ravager Orders, Marksman Orders, Trickster Orders, Guardian Orders, or Precision Orders. You gain the chosen Feature, even if you do not meet its prerequisites.

Taskmaster.name: Taskmaster
Taskmaster.description: You may grant your Pokemon up to three injuries. If your Pokemon has at least one Injury, it becomes Hardened.

Wind Runner.name: Wind Runner
Wind Runner.description: You gain the Levitate Ability. You have a total Levitate Speed equal to 4 plus half of the higher of your Acrobatics or Perception Rank.

Pact Gift - Crush Grip.name: Pact Gift - Crush Grip
Pact Gift - Crush Grip.description: You learn the Move Crush Grip.

Hunter.name: Hunter
Hunter.description: Choose Teamwork or Pack Hunt. You gain the Chosen Ability.

Re-Balancing.name: Re-Balancing
Re-Balancing.description: The target loses 2 Tutor Points, and gains one of the following: +1 to all Base Stats, +2 to two different Base Stats, or +3 to a single Base Stat. The target then redistributes their Stat Points. A Pokemon may be targeted by Re-Balancing only once.

Flexible Preparations.name: Flexible Preparations
Flexible Preparations.description: The target may reallocate up to 2d6 of Poffin-Derived Contest Stats from one Contest Stat to another. This effect lasts until the end of the day.

Diffuse Pain.name: Diffuse Pain
Diffuse Pain.description: Choose an additional target for the Move.

Decisive Director.name: Decisive Director
Decisive Director.description: Add or subtract X from the target's Initiative until the end of your next turn. X is equal to your Charm Rank doubled.

Sparkle.name: Sparkle
Sparkle.description: You learn the Moves Tri-Attack and Weather Ball.

Counter Stance.name: Counter Stance
Counter Stance.description: You perform an Attack of Opportunity against them.

Pact Gift - Dark Void.name: Pact Gift - Dark Void
Pact Gift - Dark Void.description: You learn the Move Dark Void.

Major Gift - Oneiromancy.name: Major Gift - Oneiromancy
Major Gift - Oneiromancy.description: You gain the Dream Reader Capability.

Deep Cold.name: Deep Cold
Deep Cold.description: The target is Frozen, and has their Attack, Special Attack, and Speed Combat Stages lowered by 1 each. The target is automatically cured of the Frozen Condition after 1 full round. A foe may be affected by Deep Cold only once per Scene.

Agility Training.name: Agility Training
Agility Training.description: The target becomes Agile until the end of the effect duration. Agile Pokemon gain a +1 bonus to Movement Capabilities and +4 to Initiative.

Complex Orders.name: Complex Orders
Complex Orders.description: You may choose a different Order to give to each Target. You must pay all AP costs and follow Frequency restrictions for all Orders used in this way.
prereqs: at least two Features with the [Orders] Tag that have targets

Oceanic Feeling.name: Oceanic Feeling
Oceanic Feeling.description: You may activate Oceanic Feeling when either Wash Away or Storm Drain would be triggered to gain that Ability for 1 full round, if you do not already have it, and immediately Trigger it. Activating an Ability this way ignores its usual Frequency. You may use each Ability once per Scene this way.

Pact Gift - Aeroblast.name: Pact Gift - Aeroblast
prereqs: All Lugia and Shared Tower Duo Major Gifts

Pact Gift - Shadow Force.name: Pact Gift - Shadow Force
Pact Gift - Shadow Force.description: You learn the Move Shadow Force.
prereqs: All Giratina and Shared Creation Trio Major Gifts

Major Gift - Doom Desire.name: Major Gift - Doom Desire
Major Gift - Doom Desire.description: You learn the Move Doom Desire.

Advanced Capture Techniques.name: Advanced Capture Techniques
Advanced Capture Techniques.description: At each Rank, you gain two Capture Techniques of your choice, found on the next page. You must meet any prerequisites of the Technique. You may qualify for Advanced Capture Techniques' prerequisites with the Acrobatics, Athletics, Stealth, Survival, Guile, or Perception Skills only.

Druid's Call.name: Druid's Call
Druid's Call.description: 6 small saplings, flowery bushes, or mushroom patches (depending on your oath) suddenly grow within 6 meters of you, occupying 1 square each. This veg- etation lasts until the end of the encounter, and acts as rough terrain that blocks line of sight for Pokemon and Trainers without the Naturewalk (Forest) Capability. Whenever you use a Move learned through Nature's Embrace, you may have it originate from these Plants as if they were the user. This Feature must be used on soil, or terrain under which soil is hidden by only a few inches (such as most sidewalks, parking lots, gravel or woodchip lots, etc.)

Critical Moment.name: Critical Moment
Critical Moment.description: The bonuses from your Pokemon's [Training] are tripled until the end of your next turn.

Brightest Flame.name: Brightest Flame
Brightest Flame.description: Your Pokemon's damaging Fire-Type Moves Burn their target on a roll of 18+. If a Move already has a chance to Burn a target, this Effect Range is instead increased by +3. Additionally, your Pokemon's damaging Fire-Type Moves deal additional damage equal to your Type-Linked Skill Rank against Burned targets.

Pheromone Markers.name: Pheromone Markers
Pheromone Markers.description: The triggering foe gains 1 Pheromone Stack. Your Bug-Type attacks gain a +2 bonus to Accuracy Rolls and +1 Critical Hit range against foes for each Pheromone Stack they have. Once per Scene per foe, when they gain their third or higher Pheromone Stack, you may choose to roll 1d6. On a result of 1 or 2, the foe becomes Con- fused; on a result of 3 or 4 the foe becomes Suppressed; on a result of 5 or 6 the foe becomes Enraged.

Stalwart Bastion.name: Stalwart Bastion
Stalwart Bastion.description: While this Feature is Bound, you and all cardinally adjacent allies gain Damage Reduction equal to your Combat or Focus Rank.

Earthshifter.name: Earthshifter
Earthshifter.description: You initiate a Trip Maneuver against 1 target of the Move. The Maneuver automatically hits, and you may use your Focus or Intuition for the opposed check

Flight.name: Flight
Flight.description: You gain a Sky Speed equal to your Levitate Speed plus your Acrobatics or Perception Rank for the remainder of the round.

Code Injection.name: Code Injection
Code Injection.description:
You may use any of the Glitches below. They are treated as a Status-Class attack with an AC of 2. You may only use each Glitch once per Scene, and each target may only be affected by Code Injection once per Scene.
>Object Not Found
>Access Denied
>Blue Screen

Major Gift - Storm of the Century.name: Major Gift - Storm of the Century

Major Gift - Touch of the Flayed One.name: Major Gift - Touch of the Flayed One
Major Gift - Touch of the Flayed One.description: Trigger: You inflict Injuries on a Target.

Skill Monkey.name: Skill Monkey
Skill Monkey.description: You may re-roll the triggering Skill Check with a +2 Bonus, taking the new result. This Feature may be used to re-roll a specific roll only once.
prereqs: Three Skills at Adept Rank or higher

PK Combat.name: PK Combat
PK Combat.description: You may also wield weapons and items with your Telekinesis capability, as long as you are able to lift them. This means you may use Items and Melee Weapons that normally require you to be adjacent to your target at a range limited only by your Telekinesis. When wielding Weapons with your Telekinesis, you qualify for Moves using Focus instead of Combat and may add your Special Attack instead of your Attack Stat. The Attacks remain Physical, however.

Hex Maniac.name: Hex Maniac
Hex Maniac.description: Choose Cursed Body or Omen. You gain the Chosen Ability

Cruel Gaze.name: Cruel Gaze
Cruel Gaze.description: You learn the Moves Glare and Headbutt.

Psionic Sight.name: Psionic Sight
Psionic Sight.description: You are able to visibly see any Psychic Residue left on Humans or Pokemon due to the effects of Psionic abilities. Each Human or Pokemon leaves distinct Psychic Residue on their targets; you are easily able to distinguish which targets have been affected by the same Psionic, though to identify that Psionic you need to have a way of knowing their signature (such as simply seeing them do it, and seeing the resulting signature).

Deadly Gambit.name: Deadly Gambit
Deadly Gambit.description: The triggering attack automatically hits as if it was a Critical Hit. Before damage resolves, your Pokemon may use a 1-Target damaging attack on the foe making the triggering attack as an Interrupt, Frequency allowing, and also automatically hits as a Critical Hit. Damage for both attacks then resolve at the same time.

Upheaval.name: Upheaval
Upheaval.description: Your Pokemon may make a Trip Attempt as a Free Action against any Pokemon targeted by the Move, or standing on a square changed by the Groundshaper capability. Your Pokemon gains a bonus to their Combat Roll equal to half of your Type-Linked Skill Rank.

Expand Horizons.name: Expand Horizons
Expand Horizons.description: Your Pokemon gains 3 Tutor Points. A Pokemon may be targeted by Expand Horizons only once.

Champion of Steel.name: Champion of Steel
Champion of Steel.description: The attack or Move increases your Defense by 1 Combat Stage on 16+ and you may have it deal Steel- Type Damage if you wish.

Major Gift - Diamond Storm.name: Major Gift - Diamond Storm
Major Gift - Diamond Storm.description: You learn the Move Diamond Storm.

Pact Gift - Spacial Rend.name: Pact Gift - Spacial Rend
Pact Gift - Spacial Rend.description: You learn the Move Spacial Rend.
prereqs: All Palkia and Shared Creation Trio Major Gifts

Major Gift - Storm of the Fallen World.name: Major Gift - Storm of the Fallen World

Major Gift - Knight of the Fallen God.name: Major Gift - Knight of the Fallen God
Major Gift - Knight of the Fallen God.description: You gain the Giftsapper Feature regardless of prerequisites, and you are not bound by its requirements with respect to Gifts. Giftsapper when gained this way has no effect on Gifts granted by MissingNo.

Crystal Artificer.name: Crystal Artificer
Crystal Artificer.description: You may use any Crystal Artificer Recipe for which you qualify.

One With the Winds.name: One With the Winds
One With the Winds.description: You summon a windy breeze that follows you around. Your sense of touch is extended through this wind, and you can guide it by thought, using it to perceive the shape and texture of objects as long as the wind can reach, even through very small cracks and holes. The range of this effect is equal to your Acrobatics Rank plus Perception Rank in meters.

Pact Gift - Sacred Fire.name: Pact Gift - Sacred Fire
Pact Gift - Sacred Fire.description: You learn the Move Sacred Fire.
prereqs: All Ho-Oh and Shared Tower Duo Major Gifts

Ninja.name: Ninja
Ninja.description: You learn the Moves Double Team and Poison Powder.

Disruption Order.name: Disruption Order
Disruption Order.description: Until the end of user's next turn, all targets hit by the Move are Slowed, suffer a -X to Accuracy Rolls, and are Flinched by Damaging Attacks on 16+.

Equipment Savant.name: Equipment Savant
Equipment Savant.description: Use or Equip an Item or piece of Equipment which would normally require a Standard Action to use or equip. You may not make an Attack with a Weapon this way - using other Items or Equipment that requires \

Living Shadow.name: Living Shadow
Living Shadow.description: Your own Shadow can attack others; you may have your Dark Type Moves originate from any Square adjacent to you. If you are fighting among complete darkness, you may have your Dark Type Moves origi- nate from any square within X meters that is completely dark, where X is the higher of your Guile or Stealth Rank. Attacks originating from Living Shadow do not trigger effects that rely on being hit with a melee attack.

Major Gift - Nomad.name: Major Gift - Nomad
Major Gift - Nomad.description: You gain the Transporter Ability. Note that this automatically grants you the Move Teleport.

Stat Link.name: Stat Link
Stat Link.description: The triggering Pokemon gains +1 Combat Stage to your Chosen Stat. (Note: The \

Psionic Analysis.name: Psionic Analysis
Psionic Analysis.description:
You are able to analyze Psychic Residue and can determine the following information about the Trainer or Pokemon that left the residue:
> Whether they are a Human or a Pokemon
> Which Psychic-Type Moves they know
> If they're Human, which of the following Class Features they have

Hex Maniac Studies.name: Hex Maniac Studies
Hex Maniac Studies.description: Learn two Hex Maniac Moves. You may choose any Move marked with the Hex Maniac Studies Rank you are taking or lower.

Hidden Power (Feature).name: Hidden Power (Feature)
Hidden Power (Feature).description: You learn the Move Hidden Power. Whenever you use Hidden Power, it may be either Physical or Spe- cial, adding the appropriate Attack Stat.

Menace.name: Menace
Menace.description: Until their next turn, the target has their Initiative lowered to 0. For one full round, attacks against them cause them to Flinch on 17+ or have their existing Flinch Range increased by +4.

Perseverance.name: Perseverance
Perseverance.description: The target instead does not gain an Injury. Perseverance may activate only once per Scene per target.

Upgrader.name: Upgrader
Upgrader.description: You may craft any Augmentation Recipe for which you qualify and install them on yourself and willing Pokemon and Trainers.

Pact Gift - Magma Storm.name: Pact Gift - Magma Storm
Pact Gift - Magma Storm.description: You learn the Move Magma Storm.

Fearsome Display.name: Fearsome Display
Fearsome Display.description:
The Move gains additional effects.
> Leer
> Chip Away
> Headbutt
> Glare
> Mean Look
> Endure
> Slack Off

Observation Party.name: Observation Party
Observation Party.description: While they are in a Location in your Travel Archive, your Pokemon have the Ability you chose when gaining Travel Archive and gain a +2 bonus to Perception Checks to notice the environment.

Athlete.name: Athlete
Athlete.description: After an hour of exercise, an Athlete may choose two different Stats besides HP; both of those stats become Trained Stats. The default State of Trained Stats is +1 Combat Stages instead of 0. An Athlete may have two Trained Stats at a time.

PokeManiac.name: PokeManiac
PokeManiac.description: Make a Pokemon Education Check with a DC of 10. If you succeed, you determine the target's Level, Types, Nature, and Abilities.

Wilderness Guide.name: Wilderness Guide
Wilderness Guide.description:
Wilderness Guide's effect depends on your current terrain.
> Grassland or Forest
> Ocean or Wetlands
> Desert or Tundra
> Mountain or Cave
> Urban

Noblesse Oblige.name: Noblesse Oblige
Noblesse Oblige.description: You gain the Regal Challenge Ability.

Double Shot.name: Double Shot
Double Shot.description: You may make two Struggle Attacks with a -2 penalty to Accuracy, each targeting the same foe. If the first attack gains the benefit of Aiming Down the Sights or Clear Shot, the second attack also gains the same benefits for free.

Major Gift - Lightning Rod.name: Major Gift - Lightning Rod
Major Gift - Lightning Rod.description: You gain the Lightning Rod Ability.

Herb Lore.name: Herb Lore
Herb Lore.description: You may create Energy Powder, Heal Powder, or Poultices from ingredients, as listed below.

Tornado Charge.name: Tornado Charge
Tornado Charge.description: Your Pokemon gains 2 additional Standard Actions this turn. Your Pokemon may also Shift between taking each action, so long as their total Movement does not exceed their Movement Capabilities. All three of your Pokemon's Standard Actions this turn must be used to perform Zephyr Shield, or Flying-Type Moves with a Frequency of At-Will or EOT. Tornado Charge may be used only once per day per Pokemon.

Lucky Clover Grand Finale.name: Lucky Clover Grand Finale
Lucky Clover Grand Finale.description: You learn the Moves Moonblast and Aromatic Mist.

Sharpen Shadows.name: Sharpen Shadows
Sharpen Shadows.description: You learn Dark Pulse and Night Slash

Frost Touched.name: Frost Touched
Frost Touched.description: Choose two out of Haze, Ice Shard, Mist, and Powder Snow. You learn the Chosen Moves.

Sovereignty.name: Sovereignty
Sovereignty.description: While this Feature is bound, you gain a +2 Bonus to Save Checks against Volatile Status Afflictions, and a +2 Bonus to Opposed Checks when defending against being Disarmed, Grappled, Pushed, or Tripped.

Power Conduit.name: Power Conduit
Power Conduit.description:
Choose One:
> Trade all Combat Stages for a single Stat between two Channeled Pokemon
> Transfer a Coat from one Channeled Pokemon to another.
> Give up a use of Scene or Daily Move from one willing Channeled Pokemon to regain use of a Scene Move which another Channeled Pokemon has used. This effect may only refresh a Move for each Pokemon once per Scene.

Major Gift - Ashes of the Phoenix.name: Major Gift - Ashes of the Phoenix

True Power.name: True Power
True Power.description: You gain one of the Domains and its corresponding Legendary Aura associated with your Legendary Form. This Feature may be taken multiple times, but with the second time at Pokemon Form Level 60, and the third at Pokemon Form level 75.

Culinary Appreciation.name: Culinary Appreciation
Culinary Appreciation.description: The target loses 2 Tutor Points and gains the Gluttony Ability.

Signer.name: Signer
Signer.description: Choose a Rank 1 Blessing. You gain this Blessing in the form of a Sign. Signs store the energy of the Divine, and may be activated as a Swift Action. Signs can be used once per Scene, and cost 1 AP to activate.

Earth Mother's Blessing.name: Earth Mother's Blessing
Earth Mother's Blessing.description: Each Rank, choose Arena Trap or Lightning Rod. You gain the chosen Ability.

In My Name.name: In My Name
In My Name.description: You acquire a Blessing marked with the In My Name Rank you are gaining or lower. You must additionally meet any Prerequisites of the Blessing.

Celerity.name: Celerity
Celerity.description: While this Feature is Bound, add your Type- Linked Skill to the target's Initiative. Additionally, if the Target uses a Disengage Maneuver, they may Shift as if Slowed instead of shifting only 1 Meter.

Type Expertise.name: Type Expertise
Type Expertise.description: Each Rank, choose a Type of which you know at least 3 Moves. You gain STAB for the chosen Type. STAB is never applied to Struggle Attacks.
prereqs: 3 Moves of the Chosen Type in your Move List

Unconquerable.name: Unconquerable
Unconquerable.description: Your Pokemon is cured of up to three Status Afflictions.

Ninja's Arsenal.name: Ninja's Arsenal
Ninja's Arsenal.description: You may craft an Antidote, Smoke Ball, Caltrops, or Toxic Caltrops for $100.

Top Percentage.name: Top Percentage
Top Percentage.description: Your Pokemon gains an extra Tutor Point. Top Percentage may be used on a single Pokemon a maximum of 4 times. Once a Pokemon has gained 4 Tutor Points in this way, increase each of that Pokemon's Base Stats by +1.

Bounce Shot.name: Bounce Shot
Bounce Shot.description: After hitting its mark or landing, your Poke Ball bounces 3 meters in any direction. You may have your Poke Ball trigger captures or releases before or after the bounce.

Phantom Menace.name: Phantom Menace
Phantom Menace.description: You gain the Moves Shadow Claw and Phantom Force. You may use these Moves as Weapon Attacks when wielding Melee Weapons.

Call The Current.name: Call The Current
Call The Current.description: You learn 2 Moves chosen from the list below, marked with the Rank of this Feature you are gaining or lower.

Strange Energy.name: Strange Energy
Strange Energy.description: You learn the Moves Heal Block and Magic Coat.

Stay With Us!.name: Stay With Us!
Stay With Us!.description: You must be able to Shift to your target to use this Feature. If you can, you immediately do so, and may apply a Potion, Super Potion, Hyper Potion, Energy Powder, or Energy Root. Though damage, injuries, and all other effects of the triggering attack are finalized before this Feature is applied, do not determine if the target has been Fainted, Killed, or gained Injuries from Hit Point Markers until after the effects of the action chosen through use of this Feature has been resolved.

New Normal.name: New Normal
New Normal.description: You use the highest damage value for the triggering Move. (Examples: Return is DB 9, Wring Out never has its damage decreased due to the target's Hit Points, Retaliate is DB 14) New Normal may only be used once per Scene per Pokemon. New Normal may not raise a Move's Damage Base above 14; if a Move would have its Damage Base raised above that value, it is instead raised to 14.

Parfumier.name: Parfumier
Parfumier.description: Whenever you create an Incense Held Item, choose Sweet Scent or Aromatic Mist. While your Pokemon is holding that Incense Item in an active Held Item slot, they add the chosen Move to their Move List.

Stone Cold Finish.name: Stone Cold Finish
Stone Cold Finish.description: You learn the Moves Stone Edge and Head Smash.

Major Gift.name: Major Gift
Major Gift.description: You gain one of your Patron's Major Gifts. Thiis Major Gift may be of your GM's choosing. This feat is able to be taken multiple times based on your GM's discretion.

Hobbyist.name: Hobbyist
Hobbyist.description: You gain three Skill Edges for which you qualify. These Skill Edges must rank up a Skill.

Signature Move.name: Signature Move
Signature Move.description: Choose a Move you know. Increase the Move's Frequency one step, as if you had used a PP Up. This choice cannot be changed once made. This Feature may not select Moves known through temporary means, nor can these Moves be used to qualify for this Feature.

I Meant to Do That.name: I Meant to Do That
I Meant to Do That.description:
Choose one of your equipped items you created with Improved Gadgets. It is destroyed and cannot be repaired, and that instance of Improvised Gadgets is immediately Unbound. Use the effect below corresponding to the Capability granted by the chosen item.
>Magnetic
>Threaded

Scheme Twist.name: Scheme Twist
Scheme Twist.description: You may target up to two additional Allies with the [Orders].

Robofighter.name: Robofighter
Robofighter.description: As long as this feature is Bound, you can command your Pokebot using a Standard Action rather than a Pokemon turn. Your Pokebots may still only act once a round.

Don't Look Away.name: Don't Look Away
Don't Look Away.description: The hit foe loses a Tick of Hit Points, and is Slowed for 1 round. Don't Look Away may be triggered once per round.

Echoes of the Future.name: Echoes of the Future
Echoes of the Future.description: You may roll twice and keep the best result.

Space Distortion.name: Space Distortion
Space Distortion.description: You learn the Moves Teleport and Ally Switch.

Poison Weapons.name: Poison Weapons
Poison Weapons.description: The attack or Move Poisons its targets on 16+, and you may have it deal Poison-Type Damage if you wish.

Trickster Orders.name: Trickster Orders
Trickster Orders.description: You gain the Capricious Whirl and Dazzling Dervish Orders.

Swarmlord.name: Swarmlord
Swarmlord.description: Your powers begin to take a er either Arachnid's Embrace or Monarch's Embrace. Depending on your Embrace, you gain an Ability and Stat Tag. Whenever you gain a Swarmlord Feature, you gain the same Stat Tag.

Major Gift - Air Lock.name: Major Gift - Air Lock
Major Gift - Air Lock.description: You gain the Air Lock Ability.

Warper.name: Warper
Warper.description: You gain the Probability Control Ability.

Tutoring.name: Tutoring
Tutoring.description: When activating this Feature, select a Move known either by yourself or by 3 Pokemon you own. This Move is Mastered. As an Extended Action, you may have Pokemon spend 2 Tutor Points to learn a Move you have Mastered. Pokemon targeted this way can only learn Moves that they could learn by Level Up, TM, Egg Move, or Move Tutor. You may take Tutoring multiple times, each time gaining 3 uses of the Feature
Tutoring.frequency: One Time Use x 3 - Extended Action
Tutoring.trigger: One Time Use x 3 - Extended Action
prereqs: a move that you or three of your Pokemon know

Beguiling Dance.name: Beguiling Dance
Beguiling Dance.description: When creating Dance Moves, you can choose to create a Dance Move that has Range: 4, 1 Target, AC 3, and lowers a Combat Stat (chosen at creation) by -2 Combat Stages. This Move is otherwise the same as other Dance Moves you could create except that Dance Moves created with this template have the Contest Effect Excitement instead of Get Ready!.

Precision Orders.name: Precision Orders
Precision Orders.description: You gain the Pinpoint Strike and Perfect Aim Orders.

Traceur.name: Traceur - Urban Terrain
Traceur.description: The city is your jungle. You gain a +1 Bonus to your Jump Capabilities. Add half your Survival Rank to your Evasion against Push, Trip, and Attack of Opportunity Maneuvers.

Aerialist.name: Aerialist
Aerialist.description: You learn the Moves Aerial Ace and Splash.

Miasma's Call.name: Miasma's Call
Miasma's Call.description: You learn the moves Acid Armor and Sludge Bomb.

Enhanced Embrace.name: Enhanced Embrace
Enhanced Embrace.description: Learn two Moves from the list below at the Rank of Enhanced Embrace you are taking or lower. Moves marked with an Embrace require that Embrace to be chosen.

Spark Master.name: Spark Master
Spark Master.description: Choose Static or Electrodash. You gain the Chosen Ability.

Pact Gift - Origin Tutor.name: Pact Gift - Origin Tutor
Pact Gift - Origin Tutor.description: Target: Your Pokemon with at least 3 Tutor Points

Versatile Wardrobe.name: Versatile Wardrobe
Versatile Wardrobe.description: The target loses 2 Tutor Points and then becomes chic. Chic Pokemon gain two extra Held Item slots with which they can carry Held Items. However, the items in these slots have no effect and are not treated as equipped. As a Swift Action on their turn, Chic Pokemon may swap a currently active Held Item with an item stored in these slots. Chic Pokemon may not carry multiple items of the same type or with repeated effects.

Researcher.name: Researcher
Researcher.description: Choose two Researcher Fields of Study. You may take Features from those Fields with this instance of Researcher. Gain one Feature from a chosen Researcher Field for which you qualify.
prereqs: An Education Skill at Novice Rank

Corrupt Blood.name: Corrupt Blood
Corrupt Blood.description: You are immune to the Poisoned and Badly Poisoned statuses and resist Poison-type attacks one step further.

Guardian Orders.name: Guardian Orders
Guardian Orders.description: You gain the Brace for Impact and Sentinel Stance Orders.

Ground Out.name: Ground Out
Ground Out.description: Pick two of Drill Run, Magnitude, or Mud Bomb. You learn the chosen Moves.

Dark Soul.name: Dark Soul
Dark Soul.description: Choose Shadow Tag or Super Luck. You gain the chosen Ability.

Item Mastery.name: Item Mastery
Item Mastery.description: You learn the Moves Fling and Recycle.

Move Sync.name: Move Sync
Move Sync.description: The target loses 1 Tutor Point. Pick a Move in the target's Move List. The picked move is now permanently your Chosen Type, and may have different effects. See the Types Changes section (page 468) for more information and suggestions. A Pokemon may have only one Move-Sync'd Move in their Move List at a time; to Sync a new Move, the old Move must be forgotten.

Prism.name: Prism
Prism.description: You learn the Moves Flash and Swift.

Weather Systems.name: Weather Systems
Weather Systems.description: Your Pokemon loses 2 Tutor Points, and learns your choice of Hail, Rain Dance, Sandstorm, or Sunny Day. The target must be able to learn the chosen Move through Level-Up, TM, or Tutor Moves. If the target has the chosen Move in their Level-Up List, Weather Systems costs no Tutor Points.

Egg Tutor.name: Egg Tutor
Egg Tutor.description: The target loses 2 Tutor Points, and learns any Move from its Egg Move List. A Pokemon may be targeted by Egg Tutor only one time.

Flood!.name: Flood!
Flood!.description: Your Water-Type Pokemon may activate Flood! as a Shift Action to use a damaging Water-Type Move as if had a range of Line 4 or Close Blast 2 instead of its usual range.

Chemist.name: Chemist
Chemist.description: You may craft any Chemistry Recipe for which you qualify using your Chemistry Set.

Tyrant's Roar.name: Tyrant's Roar
Tyrant's Roar.description: Your Pokemon creates a Burst 2, Slowing all Foes in the area and causing those foes to lose 1 Combat Stage in any Stat in which they have positive Combat Stages

Major Gift - Magma Armor.name: Major Gift - Magma Armor
Major Gift - Magma Armor.description: You gain the Magma Armor Ability.

Shadow Form.name: Shadow Form
Shadow Form.description: While this Feature is Bound, your appearance becomes wan and obviously otherworldly. Your natural Weaknesses, Resistances, and Immunities change to match that of the Ghost Type. Additionally, while in Shadow Form, you are immune to the Cursed Status (if you were previously Cursed, you are instantly cured upon going into Shadow Form) and gain the Phasing Capability. You may unbind this Feature as a Swift Action, returning to your normal appearance.

Highly Responsive to Prayers.name: Highly Responsive to Prayers
Highly Responsive to Prayers.description: You may use the Sage Feature as a Free Action targeting the triggering ally. Multiple instances of Sage's effect that you use may stack when used this way.

Hits the Spot.name: Hits the Spot
Hits the Spot.description: The target gains Temporary Hit Points equal to your Intuition Rank doubled. These Temporary Hit Points stack from any Temporary Hit Points granted by Accentuated Taste, the Digestion Buff or by the Lunchbox Ability.

Telepathic Awareness.name: Telepathic Awareness
Telepathic Awareness.description: Choose Gentle Vibe or Telepathy. You gain the chosen Ability.

Fire Bringer.name: Fire Bringer
Fire Bringer.description: Choose two of Flame Burst, Flame Wheel, Flame Charge, or Will-O-Wisp. You learn the chosen Moves

Expend Momentum.name: Expend Momentum
Expend Momentum.description:
Apply one of the following effects on the target by spending that much Momentum.
> Spend 1 Momentum
> Spend 2 Momentum
> Spend 3 Momentum

Sword of Body and Soul.name: Sword of Body and Soul
Sword of Body and Soul.description: You may have the triggering Move deal damage as if it was your choice of Physical or Special Classes. Regardless, add both your Attack and Special Attack Stats to the Damage Roll, and this attack ignores Damage Reduction. This does not stack with Twisted Power.

Aiming Down The Sights.name: Aiming Down The Sights
Aiming Down The Sights.description: Your next Weapon Attack with a long-range Weapon gains +2 to its Accuracy Roll and Critical Hit Range. This effect lasts until used or until the start of your next turn.

Trickster.name: Trickster
Trickster.description: After the Move is resolved, your Pokemon may perform a Dirty Trick or Manipulate Maneuver on that foe as a Free Action. The Maneuver automatically hits, but the target must be in range for the chosen Maneuver. Use your own Guile to resolve Manipulate Rolls.

Words of Power.name: Words of Power
Words of Power.description: Instead of a Burst, you may choose to have Hidden Power be a 1 Target Melee, 1 Target 6m, or Cone 2. Additionally, you and your Prime Unown always have STAB on Hidden Power as if you or they were of the same Type.

Twisted Soul.name: Twisted Soul
Twisted Soul.description: You gain the Twisted Power Ability.

Authentic Thaumaturgy.name: Authentic Thaumaturgy
Authentic Thaumaturgy.description: You may apply a Rank 2 Power Manipulation to your attack.

Marsh Stomper.name: Marsh Stomper - Wetland Terrain
Marsh Stomper.description: You can handle the toxic fauna and flora of the marshes. You do not lose Hit Points from Poison and lose only 1 instead of 2 Combat Stages from Poison. You still count as Poisoned for the purpose of Moves and effects.

Trail Blazer.name: Trail Blazer
Trail Blazer.description: Your Pokemon sets the ground aflame and leaves a Fire Hazard in each square it shifts through this round, up to a maximum of 8 squares. Anyone who begins or ends their turn on a Fire Hazard are Burned. Anyone that passes through a Fire Hazard loses a Tick of Hit Points. If a Ground, Rock, or Water-Type Move targets a square (or a target in a square) with Fire Hazard in them, the Fire Hazards are destroyed. All effects that destroy Hazards extinguish Fire Hazards. Trail Blazer may only be used once per Scene.

Plains Runner.name: Plains Runner - Grassland Terrain
Plains Runner.description: Your Overland Speed is increased by +2. You gain a +2 bonus to Perception Checks to spot or identify objects in the far distance.

Surefooted.name: Surefooted - Mountain Terrain
Surefooted.description: You're not afraid of precarious ledges and steep hills. You gain a +2 Bonus to Skill Checks made to climb, balance, or maintain footing - including resisting Push and Trip maneuvers. Whenever you take falling damage, ignore one meter and receive one less Injury when determining damage.

Cave Dweller.name: Cave Dweller - Cave Terrain
Cave Dweller.description: Your eyes are used to very low levels of light. You do not suffer Blindness for being in Low-Light conditions. If you would be Totally Blinded by complete darkness, you instead suffer the penalties of Blindness, and may make Survival Checks instead of Acrobatics to avoid becoming Tripped. You are immune to Stealth Rock Hazards.

Forest Ranger.name: Plains Runner - Forest Terrain
Forest Ranger.description: You're used to navigating the dense plant life of large forests. You gain the Stealth Capability.

Arctic Pilgrim.name: Arctic Pilgrim - Tundra Terrain
Arctic Pilgrim.description: Neither deep, slow, nor slippery ice can deter you. You are immune to the effects of Hail and to the Frozen condition, and gain 5 Damage Reduction against Ice- Type attacks.

Major Gift - Heart Swap.name: Major Gift - Heart Swap
Major Gift - Heart Swap.description: You learn the Move Heart Swap.

Deep Diver.name: Deep Diver - Ocean Terrain
Deep Diver.description: You love nothing better than the smell of the sea. Your Swimming Capability is equal to your Overland Capability instead of half. Additionally, you may hold your breath underwater for a number of minutes equal to your Survival Rank before you start suffocating.

Major Gift - Negate Emotion.name: Major Gift - Negate Emotion
Major Gift - Negate Emotion.description: Target: Pokemon or Trainer within 8 meters

Targeted Profiling.name: Targeted Profiling
Targeted Profiling.description: On the target's next turn, they act as if they had the Mold Breaker Ability against all Pokemon and Trainers in your Profile Archive and gains a +2 bonus to Accuracy Rolls against these targets.

Stat Ace.name: Stat Ace
Stat Ace.description: Your Pokemon have their Chosen Base Stat increased by +1, and by +1 more for every 10 Levels they have (for example, a Level 20 Pokemon would have your Chosen Stat's base value increased by +3). Additionally, your Pokemon may ignore Base Relations, as long as they are adding to your Chosen Stat, and you do not need to \
prereqs: 1 Pokemon with the chosen stat of 15 or more

Training Regime.name: Training Regime
Training Regime.description:
You gain additional static bonuses based on your Trained Stats.
> Attack
> Defense
> Special Attack
> Special Defense
> Speed

Major Gift - God Crusher.name: Major Gift - God Crusher
Major Gift - God Crusher.description: You gain the Godslayer Feature. If you already possess the Godslayer Feature, you may instead take another Feature for which you qualify for instead. When using Godslayer, the AC is now 8, and you do not suffer from feedback.

Major Gift - Expanded Horizons.name: Major Gift - Expanded Horizons
Major Gift - Expanded Horizons.description: You gain either the Telepath or Telekinetic Capability. If you possess both of these from their respected Trainer Classes, you instead gain the Godslayer Feature.

Front Line Healer.name: Front Line Healer
Front Line Healer.description: When you apply a Restorative, you gain +5 Damage Reduction for 1 full round. Whenever you use Combat Medic's Primer's Rank 2 effect, you may apply the same effect on yourself. Damage Reduction from this Feature does not stack with itself.

Rainbow Light.name: Rainbow Light
Rainbow Light.description: You create a Rainbow lasting one full round. While this Rainbow persists, the Effect Range of all Allies is increased by +3.

Divine Wind.name: Divine Wind
Divine Wind.description: Choose a type of Blessing you can generate with a Sage Move. All Blessings you generated of another type become Blessings of the chosen type. This may not be used to generate more uses of a Blessing than the original Move creates. For example, three Lucky Chant Blessings would become two Reflect or Light Screen Blessings, not three. You may only choose a Blessing type once per Scene.

Fire Breather.name: Fire Breather
Fire Breather.description: Learn two Fire Bringer Moves from the list below. You may choose any Move marked with the Fire Breather Rank you are taking or lower.

Lay on Hands.name: Lay on Hands
Lay on Hands.description: Choose Blessed Touch or Healer. You gain the Chosen Ability.

Medical Techniques.name: Medical Techniques
Medical Techniques.description: The target of the triggering action gains a Tick of Hit Points, plus an additional amount of Hit Points equal to your Medicine Education Rank.

Stat Training.name: Stat Training
Stat Training.description: Your Pokemon loses 1 Tutor Point, and learns a Move based on your Chosen Stat, even if your Pokemon cannot normally learn this Move.

True Steel.name: True Steel
True Steel.description: Your Pokemon gains Damage Reduction against the attack equal to your Type-Linked Skill Rank. Additionally, calculate Type Effectiveness with this attack as if your Pokemon has no Typings besides Steel.

Sage's Benediction.name: Sage's Benediction
Sage's Benediction.description:
The triggering ally gains an additional benefit as follows, depending on the Move used. The benefit takes effect after the Blessing and the attack that triggered it are resolved.
> Reflect
> Light Screen
> Safeguard
> Lucky Chant

Major Gift - Dark Aura.name: Major Gift - Dark Aura
Major Gift - Dark Aura.description: You gain the Dark Aura Ability.
prereqs: Major Gift - Touch of the Flayed One

Gift of Command.name: Gift of Command
prereqs: One Major Gift from Your Patron Legendary

Pact Gift - Oblivion Wing.name: Pact Gift - Oblivion Wing
Pact Gift - Oblivion Wing.description: You learn the Move Oblivion Wing.
prereqs: All Yveltal Major Gifts and Shared Mortality Duo Gifts

Seize The Moment.name: Seize The Moment
Seize The Moment.description: Your Pokemon loses 6 Momentum, and then gains +1 Momentum. Your Pokemon may immediately make an attack as an Interrupt, but this attack must target only a Tagged Foe. If the attack misses, it still deals damage as if it had the Smite keyword. If the attack hits, it's automatically a Critical Hit. If it would have already been a Critical Hit, your Pokemon gains Hit Points equal to half of its maximum Hit Points. May be used only once per Scene per Pokemon .

Polar Vortex.name: Polar Vortex
Polar Vortex.description: While this Stratagem is bound, your Pokemon may activate Moves and Abilities as if they were in Hail.

Major Gift - Mental Suggestion.name: Major Gift - Mental Suggestion
Major Gift - Mental Suggestion.description: Mental Suggestion requires both you and the Mewtwo you are bound to be in the same vicinity. Make a Focus check as if you were using Telepath. On a success, you instill a thought or action into the Target's mind as if it were one of their own. They may not immediately act on it, and will question it if it is too alien from how they would normally act, but the thought will persist as long as they are unaware of its origin.

Captured Momentum.name: Captured Momentum
Captured Momentum.description:
Choose One Effect:
> You or your Pokemon gain a +2 bonus to their next Accuracy Roll during this combat.
> You subtract your highest Skill Rank out of Acrobatics, Athletics, Stealth, Survival, Guile, or Perception from your next Capture Roll during this combat.
> You gain 1 Temporary Action Point that disappears after one full round.

Style Expert.name: Style Expert
Style Expert.description: Your Pokemon gain +2d6 to your chosen Contest Stat. These dice are counted as if coming from Poffins.
prereqs: 3 Pokemon with 3d6 in a specific certain Contest Stat from Poffins OR Coordinator
1 Pokemon with 3d6 in a specific certain Contest Stat from Poffins

Perfect Aim.name: Perfect Aim
Perfect Aim.description: The next damaging attack the target performs before the end of your next turn automatically hits and ignores Defensive Abilities but deals damage as if it were resisted one step further than normal. You may still roll to trigger any Effect Ranges or Critical Hits. All targets of the attack may not activate any Blessings in response, and the attack may not be Intercepted or avoided in any way (ex: with Dodge, Shield Moves, etc).

Incandescence.name: Incandescence
Incandescence.description: While this Feature is Bound, the target gains the Mixed Power Poke Edge effect when using damaging Fire-Type Attacks. If the target already has Mixed Power, they instead add their entire Attack and Special Attack Stats to all damaging Fire-Type Attacks, instead of one or the other. This does not stack with Twisted Power.

Lessons In Rage And Pain.name: Lessons In Rage and Pain
Lessons In Rage And Pain.description: While you have at least 1 Injury, add +X to your Damage Rolls with Rage, Flail, Fury Swipes, Thrash, and Weapon Attacks. X is equal to your Intimidate Rank plus the number of Injuries you have. You do not lose Hit Points from being Heavily Injured, and Injuries beyond the 5th do not lower your Maximum Hit Points.

Major Gift - He Who Cannot Be Shackled.name: Major Gift - He Who Cannot Be Shackled
Major Gift - He Who Cannot Be Shackled.description: Trigger: You become Trapped, Slowed, Tripped or Grappled.

Bring It On!.name: Bring it On!
Bring It On!.description:
You may trigger Bring It On! whenever...
> A Cheered Ally takes Damage, to grant them 5 Damage Reduction agains the triggering Damage.
> A Cheered Ally makes a Save Check, to grant them a +2 Bonus on that check.
> A Cheered Ally Takes a Breather, to grant them Temporary Hit Points equal to your Charm Rank. A target may benefit from each \

Fountain of Life.name: Fountain of Life
Fountain of Life.description: You may choose to take a penalty to the Damage Roll for the attack up to triple your Type-Linked Skill Rank or up to half the rolled damage for the triggering attack, whichever is lower. Your Pokemon gains twice that value in Temporary Hit Points and may cure themselves of one Status Affliction. Fountain of Life may only be used once per Scene per Pokemon.

Tough as Schist.name: Tough as Schist
Tough as Schist.description: While this Feature is Bound, allied Stealth Rock Hazards within 4 meters of your Pokemon are not used when a foe triggers them unless you want them to be. Whenever the target takes Super-Effective Damage from a Water, Grass, Ground, Fighting, or Steel Type Attack, they may consume an allied Stealth Rock Hazard within 4 meters to create temporary armor that grants them Damage Reduction equal to your Type-Linked Skill Rank for one full round.

Champ in the Making.name: Champ in the Making
Champ in the Making.description: Choose two Trained Stats for each Pokemon instead of one. A Pokemon may only have two Trained Stats this way.

Trapper.name: Trapper
Trapper.description:
You create a consumable item that creates 8 meters of Hazard within 6 meters. All 8 meters must be adjacent with at least one other space of the Hazard. These Hazards cause foes that run into them to become Slowed until the end of their next turn and have an additional effect based on the terrain in which the item was made. When foes run into these Hazards, they are destroyed after their effects resolve. Pokemon and Trainers with Naturewalk for the terrains associated with a Hazard are immune to its effects. These items must be used the same day they are created or they lose all effect.
> Dust Trap - Grassland or Desert
> Tangle Trap - Forest or Wetlands
> Slick Trap - Ocean or Tundra
> Abrasion Trap - Mountain, Cave, or Urban

Lean In.name: Lean In
Lean In.description: Both you and your Mount Resist the attack one step further.

Multi-Tasking.name: Multi-Tasking
Multi-Tasking.description: You may take two Standard Actions instead of one this turn, but both actions must have an At-Will Frequency.

Smashing Punishment.name: Smashing Punishment
Smashing Punishment.description: The Attack of Opportunity automatically hits, deals Fighting-Type Damage, and is a Critical Hit.

Keep Fighting!.name: Keep Fighting!
Keep Fighting!.description: That Ally's Hit Point count is reduced to 1 instead, and then gains Temporary Hit Points equal to your Charm Rank doubled.

Extreme Weather.name: Extreme Weather
Extreme Weather.description:
The Weather is particularly intense and has additional effects.
> Hail
> Rain
> Sandstorm
> Sun

Pain Resistance.name: Pain Resistance
Pain Resistance.description: Your Pokemon gains X Damage Reduction against the triggering attack, where X is its Tick Value multiplied by the number of Injuries it has. This may be triggered once per Scene per Pokemon.

Walk It Off.name: Walk It Off
Walk It Off.description: Remove one Injury from yourself and regain 1/4th of your maximum Hit Points. This Injury removal doesn't count against the natural healing limit on Injuries each day.

Prehistoric Bond.name: Prehistoric Bond
Prehistoric Bond.description: You also produce a Held Item from the remnants of the Fossil. The effect of this Held Item is based on the highest Base Stat of the individual Pokemon being Revived, counting the effects of Nature but no other effects that alter Base Stats. If there is a tie, the GM decides which Base Stat is used. This Held Item may only be used by Pokemon revived from Fossils

Reliable Performance.name: Reliable Performance
Reliable Performance.description: For appeal rolls, instead of making the Appeal Roll, you gain 1 Appeal Point for each Dice you would have rolled. For Accuracy Checks, act as if you had rolled a 10. For Skill Checks, multiply 3.5 by your Pokemon's Skill Rank, and use the resulting number as the result of your roll, rounded down. For all rolls, add or subtract any modifiers as normal.

Enchanting Gaze.name: Enchanting Gaze
Enchanting Gaze.description: Choose a Manipulate Maneuver effect; apply that Effect to all foes in a Cone 2. This ignores Frequency Limitations with that Maneuver and automatically succeeds against all targets without an opposed roll.
prereqs: two Provocateur Skills at Expert Rank

Overload.name: Overload
Overload.description: While this Feature is Bound, whenever the target hits a foe with an Electric Attack, they may choose to have the foe lose Hit Points equal to the target's Tick value plus your Type-Linked Skill Rank. If they do, the target loses a Tick of Hit Points after the attack is resolved.

Dabbler.name: Dabbler
Dabbler.description: At the Level 5, 10, 20, 30, and 40 Character Advancement Level Milestones, if you choose to gain Bonus Stats, you also gain an Edge for which you qualify. If you choose Bonus Edges or Features, you also gain +2 to your choice of Attack or Special Attack. This applies retroactively.

Dress to Impress.name: Dress to Impress
Dress to Impress.description: Whenever you create an Incense Held Item, choose Sweet Scent or Aromatic Mist. While your Pokemon is holding that Incense Item in an active Held Item slot, they add the chosen Move to their Move List.

Species Savant.name: Species Savant
Species Savant.description: When you take Species Savant, choose a single Evolutionary Family. Your Pokemon of your Chosen Evolutionary Family have each of their Base Stats increased by +1.
prereqs: 3 different individual Pokemon of the same evolutionary line

Directed Focus.name: Directed Focus
Directed Focus.description: Whenever your Pokemon with the Exploit or Tolerance Ability are targeted by an [Order], deal Super- Effective Damage, or take Super-Effective Damage, they gain +1 Momentum after all effects of the Move or Order are resolved.

Nuanced Performance.name: Nuanced Performance
Nuanced Performance.description: That Move's Frequency is not expended. This does not work with Moves that may fail to activate, such as moves with the Execute keyword.

Psionic Overload.name: Psionic Overload
Psionic Overload.description:
The effect of this Feature depends on the Triggering Move.
> Kinesis
> Barrier
> Psychic
> Telekinesis

Potent Venom.name: Potent Venom
Potent Venom.description: The foe does not necessarily lose Special Defense Combat Stages from Poison; instead, they lose Combat Stages in the Combat Stat of your choice. Whenever the target loses Hit Points from Poison, they lose additional Hit Points equal to your Type-Linked Skill Rank.

Pain Dampening.name: Pain Dampening
Pain Dampening.description: Choose any number of Channeled Pokemon, which must include the triggering Pokemon. Instead of resolving the attack normally, divide the damage from the attack by the number of chosen Pokemon. Each chosen Pokemon then loses that many Hit Points. For each chosen Pokemon that Resists or is Immune to the Type of the triggering attack, subtract your Intuition Rank from the damage of the attack before all calculations.

Fistful of Force.name: Fistful of Force
Fistful of Force.description: You may destroy the Shard to use the Move Judgment. Judgment's Type must be one of the Types associated with the used Shard. Instead of adding your Special Attack when using this attack, you may choose to add your Occult Education Rank tripled.

Athletic Moves.name: Athletic Moves
Athletic Moves.description: You learn two Athlete Moves marked with the Rank of this Feature you are taking or lower.

Innovation.name: Innovation
Innovation.description: The target loses 1 Tutor Point, and then learns a Move created with Innovation. See the next section for details on creating Moves for this Feature. A Pokemon may only have one Move created by Innovation at a time.

Enticing Beauty.name: Enticing Beauty
Enticing Beauty.description: The target acts as a Bait item as if it had the Alluring Capability. Add its number of Beauty Dice from Poffins as a Bonus to all d20 lure rolls.

Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: While this Feature is bound, when attacking foes that are Fainted, Flanked, Flinched, Sleeping, Stuck, Tripped, unaware of your Pokemon's presence, or otherwise do not expect an attack, the target gains a +2 bonus to Accuracy Rolls and a bonus to Damage Rolls equal to your Type-Linked Skill Rank.

Type Ace.name: Type Ace
Type Ace.description: The target loses 2 Tutor Points and learns the Last Chance or Type Strategist Ability for your Chosen Type. You may target a Pokemon only once with Type Ace.
prereqs: 2 Different Pokemon of the chosen Type

Type-Linked Skill at Novice
OR
Elemental Connection (of the chosen Type)

Type-Linked Skill at Novice
See the attached image for details on the Type-Linked Skills.

Overrun.name: Overrun
Overrun.description: Your Pokemon adds their Speed Stat in addition to their normal attacking Stat to their Damage Roll. The target gains Damage Reduction against this attack equal to their own Speed Stat.

Encore Performance.name: Encore Performance
Encore Performance.description: Choose One: Your Pokemon gains +1 Combat Stage in any Stat in which they haven't gained a Combat Stage this turn; or gains a second Standard Action this round that must be used to make an At-Will action that does not trigger Encore Peformance; or, if they are placing Hazards, they may place an additional two units; or, if they are activating a Weather Effect, it lasts an additional two turns; or, if they are activating a Blessing, it gains an additional use.

Gale Strike.name: Gale Strike
Gale Strike.description: You may roll the Accuracy Check twice, and resolve using either result. If both results would hit and you resolve the attack using the lower result, Gale Strike's Frequency is not expended.

Juggler.name: Juggler
Juggler.description: Using Quick Switch costs only 1 AP. Whenever you send a Pokemon into an encounter from a Poke Ball, they receive a +10 bonus to their Initiative during that round.

Ride as One.name: Ride as One
Ride as One.description: While you are Mounted, you and your Mount each use the highest of each other's Speed Evasion. If both you and your Mount have the same Speed Evasion, you instead each receive a +1 bonus to Speed Evasion. Whenever one of you receives Initiative, either of you may take your turn. When the next person would receive initiative, the person that did not take their turn then takes it.

Foiling Foliage.name: Foiling Foliage
Foiling Foliage.description: Pick a Grass-Type Status-Class Move known by the target. The chosen Move no longer takes up a Move Slot. A Pokemon may have only one Move bypass the Move Limit at a time; if a new Move is chosen for a Pokemon, the previous Move loses this effect.

Clever Ruse.name: Clever Ruse
Clever Ruse.description:
Your Pokemon may apply two of the effects below after the triggering attack is resolved. Your Pokemon may also take a Standard Action to trigger this Feature. This Feature may be triggered only once per round.
> They gain +4 Evasion for one full round.
> Their attacks ignore Evasion from Stats until the end of their next turn.
> They may immediately Disengage as a Free Action.

Debilitate.name: Debilitate
Debilitate.description: While this Feature is Bound, when the target sucessfully hits a Poisoned or Blighted foe with a Poison- Type Move, the foe gains a -2 penalty to Accuracy Rolls and Evasion for one full round.

Dune Walker.name: Dune Walker - Desert Terrain
Dune Walker.description: Your long hours in the unforgiving desert have made you inured to sand and heat. You're immune to the effects of Sandstorm, Sand-Attack, and Sand Tomb, and you gain 5 Damage Reduction against Fire-Type attacks.

Press On!.name: Press On!
Press On!.description:
Your Hardened Pokemon gain the following benefits, based on your Intimidate Rank
> Expert:When your Pokemon Faints, you may pay 1 AP. If you do, your Pokemon Faints at -30% Hit Points instead.
> Master: While acting at 0 Hit Points or less, your Pokemon's Critical Hit, Effect Range, Evasion, Initiative, Damage Reduction, and Resistance Bonuses from being Hardened are doubled.

Powerful Motivator.name: Powerful Motivator
Powerful Motivator.description:
Baby-Doll Eyes, Confide, Leer, and your Provocateur Moves gain additional effects. These effects occur whether the Move hits or misses.
> Baby-Doll Eyes
> Confide
> Leer
> Sweet Kiss
> Taunt
> Torment
> Lovely Kiss
prereqs: two Provocateur Skills at Adept Rank

Quick Gymnastics.name: Quick Gymnastics
Quick Gymnastics.description: You may may Shift 2 Meters. You don't count as Flanked or trigger Attacks of Opportunity until the end of your next turn. Additionally, if you activate this Feature, the triggering action does not provoke Attacks of Opportunity.

Surprise!.name: Surprise!
Surprise!.description: Make two attack rolls for the triggering action, and use the better result to finalize the attack. If both attacks would hit, the target is Flinched. Surprise! may be used only once per Scene per target. If the triggering attack was a Poke Ball, Hand Net, Cap Cannon, or Struggle Attack, Surprise! costs 1 AP to activate; otherwise, it costs 2 AP.

Chef.name: Chef
Chef.description: You may use any Chef Recipe for which you qualify.

Play Them Like a Fiddle.name: Play Them Like a Fiddle
Play Them Like a Fiddle.description:
The Move gains additional effects as listed below. You may use the effects of each Move only once per Scene.
> Baby-Doll Eyes
> Confide
> Leer
> Sweet Kiss
> Taunt
> Torment
> Lovely Kiss
prereqs: a Provocateur Skill at Expert Rank

Adrenaline Rush.name: Adrenaline Rush
Adrenaline Rush.description: You gain +1 Combat Stage in each of your Trained Stats, are cured of up to two Status Afflictions, and gain a Tick of Temporary Hit Points. Adrenaline Rush may be used only once per Scene

Dive (Feature).name: Dive (Feature)
Dive (Feature).description: You may immediately Shift 1 Meter, and then become Tripped. This Feature cannot be used if you are Stuck, Grappled, or otherwise impaired from Shifting. This Feature causes you to dodge Ranged attacks aimed at you, and may let you avoid Cones, Bursts, Blasts, or Lines if the shift removes you from the area of effect.

Stat Mastery.name: Stat Mastery
Stat Mastery.description: Stat Mastery's Effect depends on your Chosen Stat:

Arcane Training.name: Arcane Training
Arcane Training.description: You may use Arcane Weapons. Attacks made with your Arcane Weapons share the Type of your Elemental Connection. If you have Mystic Senses, these Attacks deal Normal Type Damage. Arcane Weapon users that qualified through Mystic Senses or Elemental Connection (Normal) gain a +5 Bonus to Damage Rolls and a +2 Bonus to Effect Range when using Arcane Weapon Attacks. When wielding an Arcane Weapon, you may resist Disarm Maneuvers with your Occult Education.

Rule of Cool.name: Rule of Cool
Rule of Cool.description: In Contests: Treat the Move as if it were one step more aligned with the Contest Type. If the Move would be opposing the Contest Type, it is instead neutral. If it is neutral, it is instead matching. You may activate this effect only once per Contest.

Dashing Makeover.name: Dashing Makeover
Dashing Makeover.description: When you activate Dashing Makeover, choose one Equipment or Held Item you can create. While this Feature is Bound, the target gains the effects of the chosen item, as long as they would normally be able to equip it (ex: Trainers cannot equip Incense Items).They do not need to take up an Equipment or Held Item slot to gain this benefit. A target may only be affected by one instance of Dashing Makeover at a time.

Sentry Runes.name: Sentry Runes
Sentry Runes.description: The target Glyph becomes an Unown of your Trainer Level, its Stats allocated as you wish. This Unown knows a single instance of Hidden Power, identical to your own. The Glyph can fight on its own without needing you to command it. At the end of the encounter, or after 5 minutes, the Unown returns to Unown Space forever, destroying the Glyph. You may only have one Glyph active in this way at a time; if various Alarm Glyphs are triggered to become Sentries at the same time, only one does so; the others will do so once the previous one has been destroyed if the Trigger condition is still being met.

Crippling Shot.name: Crippling Shot
Crippling Shot.description: Make a Ranged Struggle Attack attack with a -2 penalty to Accuracy. If you hit, the attack deals Damage as if it was resisted one step, but the target becomes Slowed, loses 1 Speed Combat Stage, and you initiate a Trip Maneuver against the target. You may use your Perception Skill to resolve the Opposed Check if you wish.

Bottled Lightning.name: Bottled Lightning
Bottled Lightning.description: Choose one of your Electric Type Moves with a target. You Charge the target item with this Move. Bot- tled Lightning counts as using the Move for frequency purposes. You may expend this Charge as a Swift Ac- tion on your turn to use the Move the item was charged with, originating from the item. If a Pokemon or Train- er touches a Charged item, you may instead activate this Swift Action as if it had the Priority keyword. At the end of a Scene, all items lose their Charge, and you may only have X items Charged at a time where X is half your Focus Rank.

Improvised Gadgets.name: Improvised Gadgets
Improvised Gadgets.description: Choose one of the Capabilities listed in the Target line that the target Pokemon has. You create a Main or Off-Hand Equipment Item usable by Trainers that grants the user the chosen Capability. Whenever a Trainer makes Struggle Attacks using Zapper through this Item, they may choose to use your Technology Education Rank tripled in place of an offensive Stat. When this Feature is Unbound, the Equipment Item breaks and cannot be repaired. You may only have X instances of this Feature Bound at once, where X is equal to half your Technology Education Rank.

Pact Gift - Hypergeometry.name: Pact Gift - Hypergeometry
Pact Gift - Hypergeometry.description:
Static Effect: You may always treat the distance between you and any other Trainer or Pokemon as one meter greater or one meter less as you choose for the purpose of calculating range or distance of travel. You may not use this to avoid melee attacks by switching between making their distance greater or less - a value is chosen when an action is announced and cannot be changed afterwards.

Scene Effect: You may activate this Pact Gift once per Scene when hit by a single target attack. The attack instead hits a target of your choice in an adjacent square to you.

Major Gift - Corrupt Existence.name: Major Gift - Corrupt Existence
Major Gift - Corrupt Existence.description: Target: Trainer or Pokemon within 6 meters

Adaptive Geography.name: Adaptive Geography
Adaptive Geography.description: The triggering target takes their turn as if they were in a terrain adjacent to the terrain they are in on the following graphic. For example, if you are standing in Wetlands terrain, you may act as if you are standing in Forest or Ocean Terrain. This affects Survivalist Features, Naturewalk Capabilities, Moves with the Environ Keyword, etc.

Ambient Aura.name: Ambient Aura
Ambient Aura.description:
You gain an Aura Blessing that can be spent any time as a Free Action Interrupt. When you spend an Aura Blessing, you choose one of the effects below. You may only have one Aura Blessing at a time, and you must have the Aura Pulse Capability to use Ambient Aura.
> You create an energy barrier around you or an ally within 5 meters granting Damage Reduction equal to your Intuition Rank tripled until the end of your next turn.
> You cure yourself of a Volatile Status Affliction.
> Gain the Blindsense Capability until the end of the Scene.

Duelist.name: Duelist
Duelist.description:
The Foe becomes Tagged; or if the foe is already Tagged, the foe loses the Tag. Only one foe can be Tagged this way at a time. If a new Foe is Tagged, all other Tags are lost.
Your Pokemon under the effects of Focused Training gain half their Momentum (rounded up) as a Bonus to Accuracy and Evasion against Tagged Foes, but as long as a Foe is Tagged, they do not benefit from Focused Training's Accuracy Bonus against other foes.

Soothing Connection.name: Soothing Connection
Soothing Connection.description: Distribute 5 points in any way among Pokemon you are Channeling. For each point you assign to a Channeled Pokemon, they gain a Tick of Hit Points.

Not Yet!.name: Not Yet!
Not Yet!.description: Before fainting, the targeted Pokemon gains an Injury, and may then use a Move as an Interrupt. When the Move is resolved, the Pokemon then immediately faints. This consumes a Pokemon turn as normal. This cannot be used with the Moves Explosion, Pain Split, or Self-Destruct.

Mentor.name: Mentor
Mentor.description: The target loses 1 Tutor Point, and then learns a move from its tutor list marked with a (N), or any move on its level-up list learned at X Level or lower, where X is the target's current Level plus the sum of your Mentor Skill Ranks. Note that despite being Tutored, these Moves count as if they were \
prereqs: or Pokemon Education at Novice Rank

Type Sync.name: Type Sync
Type Sync.description: The Target gains the Type of your Elemental Connection as an additional Type, or has one of their Types replaced by that Type. See the Type Changes sec- tion (page 436) for more information and suggestions. A Pokemon may be targeted by Type Sync only once. This Feature may be performed One Time for each Rank above Untrained you have of your highest of Medicine, Occult, or Tech Education, up to a maximum of 4 times at Master Rank.
prereqs: Elemental Connection; a Type-Linked Class; Adept Medicine

Fabulous Max.name: Fabulous Max
Fabulous Max.description: In Contests: Treat the Move as if it were one step more aligned with the Contest Type. If the Move would be opposing the Contest Type, it is instead neutral. If it is neutral, it is instead matching. You may activate this effect only once per Contest.

Medicinal Blend.name: Medicinal Blend
Medicinal Blend.description: Ingredients: Two Restoratives, or a Restorative and an X-Item

Suggestion.name: Suggestion
Suggestion.description: You smoothly plant a thought into the subject's head that lasts as long as this Feature is Bound. They won't know exactly why or how they thought of it; they will naturally assume they thought of it themselves, and their brain will attempt to get there as logically as it can. The target may not necessarily act on the Suggestion, especially if it is against their nature. Using Suggestion to plant a specific thought may cause the target to think about a specific subject, dredging up surface thoughts related to the matter. Using this on a target leaves discoverable psychic residue. You may only use Suggestion as long as you have the Telepathy Capability, though you may keep it Bound without having Telepathy active.

Shared Senses.name: Shared Senses
Shared Senses.description: You Imprint the target for the duration of this Feature. You receive all sensory information being sensed by Imprinted Pokemon, and Imprinted Pokemon are not subject to the distance limit on Channeling. If you have Imprinted more than one Pokemon, you may only concentrate on the senses of one Pokemon at a time, and only choose one such Pokemon per round. If you stop Channeling a Pokemon, they are no longer Imprinted as well.

Coaching.name: Coaching
Coaching.description:
